Even if your requested time is full, there may be availability before or after your desired time. Please select a second or third choice of your preference.

title: Edo Kiriko Glass Cutting Experience in Asakusa
description: Learn how to make elegant cut glass in the traditional Edo Kiriko style when visiting Tokyo. Create your own unique designs, and take home a little bit of Japanese culture!

title: Private Customized Tour of Tokyo with an English-Speaking Guide
description:
Dive deep into Japan with a special guided tour ranging from the fish market of Tsukiji to the fashion paradise of Harajuku and the hectic Shibuya streets. Create your own perfect guided tour!
See Tokyo your way with this private walking tour of Tokyo's best sights, which can be customized to fit your interests! Going by foot and public transportation, get a feel for the city and learn how to get around like a local.

title: Okutama Caving Exploration Adventure from Tokyo
description: Caving is a fun and adventurous sport. It takes hundreds of years for the stalactites to grow even a few centimeters! See the slow beauty of the caves.

title: Tea Ceremony in Nihonbashi
description:
Experience the heart of Japanese hospitality while in Tokyo, with this exclusive tea ceremony. Enjoy the peace of the tea room and aroma of the matcha tea.
The tea ceremony (sado) is one of Japan's most beloved traditions, a moment of tranquility among the bustle of the city. The friendly tea master will explain the rules and rituals of the tea ceremony, and prepare a bowl of fresh tea just for you. Enjoy the dark matcha with a Japanese sweet, then try your hand at making the frothy tea yourself! With explanations in both English and Japanese this is a fun way to get to know this peaceful art.

title: Sushi Making Course and Lunch in Central Tokyo
description:
Learn how to make different kinds of sushi, using fish, veggies and other toppings! Then enjoy a tasty lunch of your handmade delicacies.
Sushi is one of Japan's most famous dishes. During this hands-on program guests will learn how to make several kinds of sushi. Impress your friends with your sushi making skills – the perfect Japanese souvenir!

 Learn to prepare "maki sushi" (rolled sushi), "gunkan maki" (sushi rice wrapped with a strip of seaweed and topped with soft ingredients), and "nigiri sushi" (hand shaped sushi). With a little practice, you will soon be making sushi like a pro.　We offer ingredients besides raw fish, such as meats or vegetables, so that anyone can enjoy this experience.

title: Elegant Kimono Photo Shoot Experience in Tokyo
description:
Feel like a real princess in luxurious silk kimono and dramatic hair accessories! Enjoy the photo session solo, or with friends and family. Men, women and children are welcome!
Experience a luxurious kimono makeover! All of our Japanese kimono are hand-selected by professional kimono makers and woven from genuine silk. Some of them are valued at over 1 million yen! 

Our "uchikake" style kimono are like those worn by aristocratic women living in castles during the feudal era. Using our own original style, we will arrange them to make you look gorgeous in your photos. We have samurai-style kimono for men and cute kimono for kids too!  

You will receive the prints and digital images when you leave, and will be offered green tea and sweets after the photo shoot.

title: Private Kimono Experience in Tokyo at Koishikawa Koryuan
description:
If you have ever wanted to try a silk kimono, this in your chance. Our professional dressers will assist you, and then you can take pictures in full dress!
Besides the chance to wear a beautiful kimono, this activity will also allow you to learn about its origins and the traditional skills of Japanese dyeing and weaving. Kimono are wonderfully versatile, even if one's shape changes, the same kimono can be worn with just some minor adjustments.

After putting on the various layers and fastening the broad obi sash, you will have plenty of time to learn how to move gracefully in the kimono. Take as many pictures as you like, for a memento of your visit to Japan.

title: Tokyo Private Sightseeing Tour with Narita Airport Pickup
description:
Take a tour of the highlights of Tokyo. Your English-speaking driver will guide you around locations like Asakusa, the Imperial Palace and Tsukiji Fish Market. Great for visitors with tight schedules.
Make the most of your time in Tokyo with this private sightseeing tour, right after you step off the plane. A two-in-one deal, your English-speaking guide will give you a great introduction to the city while also doubling as your airport transportation. For visitors with busy schedules, this is a great way to see the famous destinations of Tokyo as soon as you land.

Stroll down Nakimase Shopping Street before reaching the imposing Kaminarimon Gate at Asakusa Temple, or try the fresh seafood at Tsukiji Fish Market. You can customize your tour with your driver to ensure you see all the sights in Tokyo that interest you.
3, 6 and 9-hour tours are available.

title: Half Day Beginners Trekking in the Ryuokyo Gorge and Nikko National Park
description: Set out an a fun and easy round trip forest trek with a guide, starting and ending at the train station. Explore the beautiful woods of the Nikko National Park.

title: Chartered Buddhist Temple and Image Sightseeing Tour by Taxi
description: Visit 13 Buddhist images at temples and shrines, tracing the route of old pilgrimages for a glimpse at the history and culture of old Japan.

title: Safflower Cotton Scarf Dyeing Lesson in Yonezawa
description:
Use natural plan-based dyes on a lightweight cotton scarf to create pretty designs. No need to worry about chemicals, making this great for kids too.
The Fabric Dyeing Studio Wakuwakukan is located nearby the Uesugi family mausoleum. The studio has lessons in handweaving and safflower dyeing, a gallery of kimono made of Yonezawa silk and a charming little cafe. The Yonezawa method of silk fabric production blossomed during the middle of the Edo period. The characteristic of Yonezawa fabric is "kusakizome," using natural plant dyes to create delicate shades of color.

title: Tono Sightseeing Course (2.5 Hour Private Taxi Charter)
description:
Experience the local traditions and explore temples of legend. This short chartered taxi tour will allow you to see all the main sightseeing spots in Tono!
Tono is known throughout Japan as the location of the Tales of Tono, a compilation of folk tales of the area. This book is now considered one of the greatest studies of Japanese folklore, many of which involve 'kappa', mischievous water sprites said to live in a local pond!

title: All Ages Yaeyama Snorkeling Adventure from Ishigaki City
description: Get up close and personal with the bright world under the waves in the tropics with an all ages snorkeling tour. The clear blue waters of Yaeyama are waiting.

title: One Day Tokaido Mt. Fuji Tour from Shizuoka
description:
Perfect for JR Rail Pass holders or those staying in Shizuoka! Visit iconic Mt. Fuji, visit a local tea farm and savor a lunch of freshly made sushi. See a different side of Mt. Fuji and hidden gems.
Use your JR Pass to meet the group in Shizuoka, and save!

title: Play in the Snow, Seafood Buffet and Strawberry Picking Tour from Tokyo
description:
Have fun sledding in the snow at a Minakami ski resort, enjoy a buffet lunch of snow crab and shrimp, then pick juicy local strawberries for dessert!
Great for kids and kids at heart, this tour will take you to the Minakami area for a day of fun in the snow!

Bundle up and then go sledding down the hills covered with bright white snow. Build a snowman, or pretend you are Elsa from 'Frozen'. Then warm up with a lunch of delicious snow crab and fresh shrimp.

Top off the tour at Farm Harada, where you can pick and eat your fill of the sweet local strawberries.

There will be a raffles held on board the bus, and all participants will receive a folding shopping bag!

title: Mt. Fuji and Lake Kawaguchi Trekking Tour from Tokyo
description:
Spend the day visiting the famous Mt. Fuji, and explore Kawaguchi Asama Shrine, Hahanoshirataki Falls and Lake Kawaguchi by foot. Witness the grand views with your English guide.
Visit one of Japan's most prominent national symbols, the one and only Mt. Fuji, with a drive up to the mountain's 5th station accompanied by an English-speaking guide. Enjoy an afternoon nature walk around the World Heritage Sites of Kawaguchi Asama Shrine, Hahanoshirataki Falls and Lake Kawaguchi under the guidance of a local staff.

title: Udon Tasting and Taxi Service to and from Takamatsu Airport
description:
A taxi driver will pick you up either at the airport or your hotel and whisk your to your destination with a stop at an udon shop, perfect for tasting the local flavors on your journey.
We will pick you at at a designated time according to your flight. The transportation service is limited to within the Kotohira, Marugame, and Sakaide areas.

title: Family Friendly Original Bizen Pottery Experience in Okayama
description: Create your very own traditional Bizen-ware Pottery using a hand wheel. Stop by to witness the unique climbing kiln used to fire the ceramics to get the distinctive texture.

title: Yonaguni Horse Riding Lesson and Island Trekking Tour
description:
Ride a Yonaguni horse, only about 120 cm tall. These strong and gentle horses are an important part of traditional life on the island, and riding is a great way to see the sights.
This is not a led activity, but one where you control a horse by yourself. All participants should first take a lesson to learn how to ride and go trekking.
We ask that first time riders apply for the Draft Horse Plan.

title: Gourmet Walking Tour of the Seafood Market in Toba
description: Sample the freshly caught fish and other seafood at the Toba Market, and discover the seasonal specialties while enjoying views of the sea and port.

title: SUP and Snorkel Combination Tour in Miyako Island
description: Explore the crystal waters off Miyako Island from above on a stand up paddleboard and below when snorkeling! Relax and check out vibrant fish and coral reefs.

title: Safflower Silk Scarf Dyeing Lesson in Yonezawa
description:
Use natural plan-based dyes on a Yonezawa silk scarf to create pretty designs. No need to worry about chemicals, making this great for kids too.
The Fabric Dyeing Studio Wakuwakukan is located nearby the Uesugi family mausoleum. The studio has lessons in handweaving and safflower dyeing, a gallery of kimono made of Yonezawa silk and a charming little cafe. The Yonezawa method of silk fabric production blossomed during the middle of the Edo period. The characteristic of Yonezawa fabric is "kusakizome," using natural plant dyes to create delicate shades of color.

title: Sightseeing Cruises and Romantic Landscapes from Nichinan
description: The Pacific Ocean is all yours! Start the day with a sunrise view or cruise around shrines and islands while enjoying nature. Sunset cruise available to top off any day with a wonderful close.

title: Half Day History and Temple Sightseeing Taxi Course from Tottori Station
description:
Discover the beauty and history of the region as you travel andexplore old castle grounds or temples that also showcase fantastic spring and fall foliage.
Tottori Castle and Jinpukaku:
The ruins of Tottori castle are now a lovely spring spot for cherry blossoms, and directly next to the Meiji Era French Renaissance styled Jinpukaku, which you can tour for a small fee of 150 JPY per adult.

Ikedake Bosho is a national historic site with 78 graves of the 1st to 11th generations of Tottori feudal clan, Ikeda and with 254 lanterns. Located near Ube Shrine, this serene spot is a prime local gem for spring cherry blossoms and autumn foliage. Admission fee: 400 JPY per person.

Chotsuin Temple
The temple in the foot of Okamasu Ishido, known as the temple with the fusuma picture of Reisen YaotanI, a painter of Meiji era. Hatou described the angry waves of the Sea of Japan, and is a masterpiece drawn across 16 panes of sliding paper doors.

title: Half Day Chartered Taxi Tour of Sand Dunes and Sanin Coast from Tottori
description:
Chase the "White Hare of Inaba" on this taaxi tour through the Sanin Kaigan Geopark and Tottori Sand Dunes, and fall in love with natural splendor.
Some of the highlights of this course include the Tottori Dunes, the largest sand dune in all Japan. Formed over 100,000 years as the Chiyo River and winds pile and arrange sand, this is a sandy beach dune on an unbelievable scale.

Vast Japanese leek fields spread in the dune coastal area. Lavender-colored flowers bloom from the end of October to the middle of November, and turn the whole area green in spring. 

The Sanin Kaigan cliffs are a sight of love to the great writer Toson Shimazaki. Formed by the rough waves of the Sea of Japan, wind, and snow, the seawater is startlingly clear, down to 25 meters. See the rugged and stark beauty of the cliffs for yourself.

title: Chartered Historical Taxi Sightseeing Tour in Chichibu
description: Learn about the Chichibu Incident, a peasant uprising during the Meiji Era. Visit Muku Shrine, Yoshida Genki Village, and Ongaku Shrine on a historical tour.

title: Simple All Ages SNUBA Diving and Tropical Swimming on Kume Island
description: Get a feel for the water with a fun and easy tank free dive. Children 4 years old and up can dive to 6 meters deep and explore the ocean with family.

title: Beginner's Half Day Stand Up Paddleboard Lesson in Tokushima
description: Paddle over the clear waters of Tokushima on a stable longboard. Great for all ages, this sport gets your outdoors and moving at your pace.

title: Pearl Strap Making Lesson with a Professional Pearl Craftsman in Uwajima
description: Visit Uwajima, one of the major pearl production areas in Japan, and make a cellphone strap with genuine pearls! Learn from the pros and create a one-of-a-kind souvenir!

title: Shabutsu Tracing Experience at Nissekiji Temple and Buddhist Vegetarian Food
description: Experience tracing a Buddhist figure at Nissekiji Temple, the main temple of the Shingon Sect. After that, enjoy a meal of delicious shoujin ryori,  Buddhist vegetarian cuisine!

title: Half-Day Sightseeing Taxi Tour Around Sakurajima Island
description: Discover the natural beauty created by the volcano of Sakurajima Island. See how the active volcano affected the lifestyles and history of Kagoshima through your private taxi tour.

title: Full Day UNESCO World Heritage Private Sightseeing Taxi Tour from Takeo City
description: Learn all about ancient Japan on a history based tour of Saga and Fukuoka. Visit Yoshinogari Historial Park, one of Japan's oldest settlements, then see the sites that fueled industry.

title: Soar like a Bird with a Tandem Paraglider Experience
description: Fly in the sky on a glider with a tandem flight. Just you and the pilot, 200 meters in the air! Feel just like a bird as you sail over the earth below.

title: Full Day Mt. Fuji Fuuketsu Cavern Tour and Caving Adventure from Tokyo
description: Meet your guide in central Tokyo, then head out to the forests and foothills of majestic Mt. Fuji. Explore the cool depths of the cave, which stay comfortable even in summer.

title: Zenidaiko Folk Music Lesson in Yasugi
description:
Learn the basics of Shimane's Yasugibusi folk music and try out the Zenidaiko, a local percussion instrument. Beginners and groups welcome!
The “zenidaiko” are hollow batons made of bamboo with coins strung on the inside. The ends of the batons are decorated with tassels, and the rattling of the coins resembles the sounds of the tambourine. The dance is characterized by its vibrant festivity and the use of the instruments in various twirling and flipping moves to accentuate the rhythm of the music.

title: Three-Hour Chartered Taxi Sightseeing Tour of Kanazawa
description: Drive through the ancient city of Kanazawa and stop by major highlights such as the Kenrokuen Garden and Kanazawa Castle with your local English speaking driver.

title: Private Taxi Charter Tour of History and Art of Nagaoka
description: Enjoy a short, two hour history tour of the city of Nagaoka. Explore castles, museums, and temples on a cozy taxi then make your way to the Statue of Hundred Straw Rice Sacks.

title: Private Taxi Tour of Kochi's Best Sights (6 hours)
description: Visit thr Harimaya Bridge or Kochi Castle! Make sure you check out the stunning beach at Katsurahama, for a stroll and great pictures of the scenery.

title: Private Three Hour Taxi Charter Tour of Kochi's Best Sights
description: Learn about the history and heroes of Kochi on this half-day tour. See Kochi Castle, and stroll by the waves at beautiful Katsurahama Beach.

title: Beginner Friendly Horse Back Riding Experience in Taketa
description: From the basics of riding to brushing and caring for horses, spend some precious time with our friendly horses while visiting Oita. An ideal activity for beginners and children!

title: Kimono Dressing Experience in Kanazawa
description:
Walk through the old streets and buildings of Kanazawa in an elegant classic or stylish modern kimono to feel as if you have stepped back in time.
Choose from a wide selection of stylish kimonos in a massive variety of fashions, materials, and colors. The knowledgeable staff will help you find the type that best suits you, and assist in getting you ready to explore the old streets of historic Kanazawa in style. Graceful and historic buildings line the streets, and it will feel like you have stepped back in time. The shop is conveniently located close to Kanazawa Station.

title: Chartered Taxi Sightseeing Tour of Karatsu City
description: Spend your morning or afternoon exploring the city of Karatsu. Get a visual history lesson while exploring the culture and natural sites  on a comfortable taxi.

title: Half Day Horse Trekking Adventure by Mount Choukai in Akita
description: Ride a horse out of Yuri Kougen Park on a horse and enjoy the great nature trails along the northern foot of Mt. Choukai. Great for experienced riders.

title: Walking Tour and Special Deluxe Seafood Lunch in Toba
description: Take a deep bite of the rich local flavors of Toba. Enjoy a walking tour and seafood lunch with your choice of dainty but luxurious or hearty and filling.

title: Pottery Painting and Culture Tour of Tottori on a Chartered Taxi
description: Visit the cultural spots of Tottori along with the sand dunes on a convenient taxi. Or get hands-on with decorating traditional Ushinoto ceramic ware for a memorable time in Tottori.

title: Sea Kayak Session at Sea of Setonaikai from Hiroshima
description: Paddle through the waters on a kayak through the Setonaikai Sea. Learn from the basics or go out exploring on your own. Explore the surrounding islands from a different point of view.

title: Private Chatered Sanin Kaigan Geopark and Regional Taxi Tour from Tottori
description:
Take a day and see all the highlights of Tottori, from the wave breaking Hakuto Coast to the sprawling sand dunes. In the city see the castle ruins and French Renaissance style manor.
Some of the highlights of this course include the Tottori Dunes, the largest sand dune in all Japan. Formed over 100,000 years as the Chiyo River and winds pile and arrange sand, this is a sandy beach dune on an unbelievable scale.

The Sanin Kaigan cliffs are a sight of love to the great writer Toson Shimazaki. Formed by the rough waves of the Sea of Japan, wind, and snow, the seawater is startlingly clear, down to 25 meters. See the rugged and stark beauty of the cliffs for yourself.

title: Half Day Chartered Land of Myth and Nature Sightseeing Taxi Tour from Tottori
description:
Take a tour of the best of Tottori, from the past to the present with your choice of course. Whether fresh seafood or staggering natural beauty, Tottori has it all.
Some of the highlights of this course include the Tottori Dunes, the largest sand dune in all Japan. Formed over 100,000 years as the Chiyo River and winds pile and arrange sand, this is a sandy beach dune on an unbelievable scale.

Karoichi Market is where the fresh seafood unloaded from the Karo fishing port is sold. You can enjoy fresh seafood from the Sea of Japan in the restaurants and stalls, or get some tasty treats to take home.

title: Personalize a Rice Scoop or Chopstick Rest with Wood Branding on Miyajima
description: Make an original rice scoop by branding it, a specialty of Miyajima. It's a unique souvenir of any trip to Hiroshima. You can also put a brand on a chopstick rest or chopsticks.

title: One Day Private Tour of Hakone and Lake Ashi from Tokyo
description:
Have an exclusive guided trip of the Hakone area. Get a detailed explanation about the environment around the great Mount Fuji and Lake Ashi in a day!
Hop on the comfortable Odakyu Romance car train out of the busy city of Tokyo to the scenic area of Hakone. With a variety of both indoor and outdoor activities for you to enjoy, learn about the various areas surrounding the great Mt. Fuji. From cruising Lake Ashi or climbing Owakudani on a cable car, each location will present another side of Mt. Fuji just for you!

title: Half Day Mountain Biking Adventure in Hakone
description:
See the best sights in Hakone on a mountain bike. Choose from a number of courses where you can ride around places including the National Park or Lake Ashi and enjoy lunch in the great outdoors.
A great plan for nature lovers, this activity has many options for you. You can rent your mountain bike or bring your own and ride around several beautiful locations in Hakone. Choose from courses which allow you to see the national park, the gorgeous Lake Ashi, known for its views of Mt. Fuji, several hidden power spots and more.

title: Flying Over the Mountains of Saitama with a Paraglider
description: Soar into the skies with a paraglider and enjoy a refreshing walk through the sky. Witness the panoramic scenery of the surrounding forests and cities spreading before your eyes.

title: Full Day Sea Kayak Tour of the Oui Coast from Yuasa
description: Kayak around the sea of Oui where you can see an untouched coastline. The course makes its way to Shirahama Hot Spring, where you can refresh after the tour.

title: Full Day Saga City Historical Sightseeing Course in a Chartered Taxi
description: Step into Japan's history with old samurai residences, buildings, tools, and other highlights from the end of the Edo Period to the early Meiji Period.

title: One-Hour Japanese Traditional Taiko Drumming Experience in Kobe
description: Feel the rhythm of Japanese traditional taiko drumming in  Kobe. No experience or Japanese language needed, just grab the sticks and leave with great memories.

title: Two-Day Hiroshima Round Trip Train and Hotel Package from Tokyo (Late Morning)
description:
Get out of Tokyo with this bargain travel package to Hiroshima that includes round trip Nozomi bullet train tickets and a stay in your choice of hotels. Explore the city overnight at your pace.
Travel to Hiroshima by Japan's fastest bullet train, the famous Nozomi Shinkansen! You can explore the historic city at your own pace with this unguided free plan. Whether a visit to serene Miyajima with the famous floating shrine, or a tour the historic museum and Atomic Bomb Dome, your time is up to you. Take the hassle out of booking separately with this bargain package, and enjoy a fast smooth ride from Tokyo to Hiroshima and back.

title: Owl Cafe 1 Hour Reservation in Kanazawa with One Drink Included
description: Take a break during your trip to Kanazawa and enjoy some relaxing time with friendly owls. You get up close, pet and take photos with the gentle birds for an hour full of feathery fun.

title: Half and Full Day Sea Kayak Rental with Lesson near Miura Kaigan
description: Set out onto the ocean with a fun and stable sea kayak. Single rider models and kayaks for two are available, so you can paddle with a friend, family, or even take your dog on the waves.

title: Beginner Half Day Surfing School in Tokushima
description: You can enjoy surfing all year in Tokushima. Join a lesson tailored to your level, and learn to ride the waves at the best spot of the day.

title: Stained Glass Photo Frame or Mirror Making Experience in Otaru
description: Create a unique personalized stained glass mirror or photo frame. Using a special color film, children as young as 6 can make their own art!

title: Half Day Naruto and Seto Inland Sea Kayak & Bike Tour
description: Get great views of the Seto Inland Sea, and see the charm of rural Shikoku. Explore Naruto by sea and land on this fun short kayak and biking tour.

title: Sea Kayaking Tour in the Naruto Kaikyo Channel in Tokushima
description:
Never kayaked before? No problem! Experienced guides will show you the beauty of Naruto's sea. Try out this popular outdoor sport and go on an adventure.
Depending on conditions on the day, you will kayak in the best spot between Konaruto, Naruto and Horikoshi Kaikyo Channel.See the Naruto whirlpools and play on the rocky shores. Check out the famous dramatic bridge, and see the stunning scenery of the Seto Inland Sea!

title: Yokai Town Sightseeing Taxi Tour in Sakaiminato
description: Discover the joys of Sakaiminato, including the Shigeru Mizuki Road, home to the characters from the long-running and famous GeGeGe no Kitaro series on a fun half day tour.

title: Beginner-Friendly Windsurfing Experience in Lake Biwa
description: Feel the cool breeze while learning to Windsurf in Japan's largest lake from friendly instructors. Participants at all levels are welcome to join this fun sport!

title: Kamikura, Hayatama Taisha and Shingu City Sightseeing Tour
description: Experience the Kumano Kodo pilgrimage as you make your way to Kamikura and Hayatama Taisha shrines. Your English-speaking guide will show you the way to these historic shrines along the forest path.

title: Full-Day Private Tokyo Tour for Large Groups from Yokohama Port
description: Catering for small groups up to groups of 60 looking for a fun shore excursion, go touring around popular spots of Tokyo in a private vehicle, all with an English speaking driver.

title: Private Taxi Excursion of Tsukumojima Islands and Sasebo City
description: Explore Sasebo city and take picturesque photos of the Tsukumojima Islands. Cruise around the beautiful coastline on a comfortable taxi with custom stops of your own.

title: 2 Hour Japanese Class and Tips for Travelers in Nagoya
description:
Make your visit to Japan easier and learn the phrases, kanji and customs you need for your trip. Feel free to ask your instructor any questions you have. Then take a trip down Endoji Shopping Street.
With this class you will learn helpful kanji, phrases and etiquette for your visit to Japan. First-time visitors to Japan can really benefit from the information provided by the friendly instructor for a smoother stay. You can also learn some helpful travel tips and enjoy a stroll down Endoji Shopping Street to unwind after your 2-hour class.

title: Private Cruiser Charter Plan in Katsuura
description: Charter a cruiser and sail the bay for a party, or set out to go enjoy fishing, snorkeling, banana boat or far more. Have fun with friends and create a fun day.

title: Silver Nature-Inspired Leaf Ring Making Experience in Yokohama
description: Learn to create a beautiful ring, resembling a delicate leaf covered in dew. Beginners welcome, experience the fun of silver-smithing during this half-day class!

title: Forest Buggy Riding Adventure in the Mt. Fuji Forest
description: Drive an ATV and tour the forest near Mt. Fuji! Drive a 4 wheeled buggy or enjoy an 8 wheeled buggy driven by a skilled instructor, for your choice of thrills.

title: Yokohama Minatomirai Private Night Cruise with Italian Dinner and Open Bar
description:
Float around Yokohama Bay on a private cruise. Enjoy the colorful night views and Italian cuisine while sipping a cocktail. Perfect for small parties!

Enjoy the luxury of a private dinner with fantastic night views, great for groups of 5 to 10! Hop on the boat near Yokohama Minatomirai Port, and get whisked off for 110 minutes of stunning night views and endless drinks! Enjoy the Italian cuisine, the perfect way to end a day of sightseeing or to celebrate a special occasion.

title: Private Jumbo Taxi Tour to Esashi Fujiwara no Sato from Hanamaki
description: See all the best sights of Fujiwara no Sato on this private chartered taxi tour in Iwate! See Mukaiyama Park,Meiji Kinenkan and more. Great for groups.

title: Kimono Rental and Dressing near Dazaifu and Yanagawa
description: Enjoy strolling around Yanagawa and Dazaifu while wearing a traditional Japanese kimono! Enjoy a day our from Fukuoka, and take beautiful pictures.

title: Driver's Recommended Private Taxi Tour of Kochi (3 Hours)
description: See all the best sights, as recommended by our professional and experienced drivers. A great option for first time visitors to lovely Kochi.

title: Private Six Hour Chartered Tour of Kochi  (Jumbo Taxi)
description:
Visit the Harimaya Bridge or Kochi Castle, and see the sublime beach at Katsurahama. See alll the best spots in Kochi and take pictures with the ocean scenes.
Up to 9 people may ride in the jumbo taxi.

title: Kimono Dress-up and Rental for Men and Women in Nagoya
description:
Stroll the streets of Nagoya in style with a beautiful and colorful kimono. Select from a variety of styles and explore the city while taking memorable photos in the gorgeous garment.
Choose from the most convenient of two kimono studios, located near Nagoya Station or Kanayama Station!

title: Hida Takayama Overnight Tour from Tokyo with Bullet Train Tickets and Hotel
description:
Visit the retro Edo-era town of Hida Takayama on this special two day trip. Explore the quaint streets and temples freely, with reserved shinkansen tickets!
Tucked away in the mountains of Gifu prefecture, Hida Takayama is famous for its beautifully preserved quarter with Edo-style streets, stunning scenery and traditional architecture.

This tour will whisk you from Tokyo to Nagoya on the bullet train, with reserved tickets on the Hida Express into town. Explore at your own pace, and spend the night relaxing in the hotsprings at the Takayama Green Hotel.

Check out the Hida Folk Village, the Sanmachi area, Takayama Jinya, sample Hida beef or the famous local ramen!

title: Healthy Japanese Home Cooking Lesson in Obihiro
description:
Learn to make Japanese-style home cooking made from healthy ingredients. After your lesson, enjoy your balanced meal. A tour of the farm where the ingredients are grown is also available.
Make a healthy home cooked meal with the help of an experienced instructor. Learn her tips and apply her expert advice to your cooking. You can enjoy your healthy meal right after you've made it. Continue the fun of healthy Japanese cooking at home with the menu and recipes from class. For those who are interested to see where the healthy ingredients used are grown, there is an optional farm tour before the class.

title: English Speaking 3 Hour Guided Taxi Tour of Kamakura
description: Relax with an English speaking driver, and discover the famous historic sights or hidden sightseeing spots on a customized tour suited for your wants and pace.

title: Private Guided Zen Buddhist Temple Tour in Kamakura
description:
Make your way to one of Japan's most beautiful spots and learn about the history and practices of Zen Buddhism in the peaceful town of Kamakura.
Explore the ancient capital of Kamakura, and visit the Zen Buddhist temples hidden away within the white sandy beaches and the tree covered hills. Take a meditative tour with your knowledgeable guide who will explain  the history and the structure of the beautiful temples and gardens. Appreciate the scenery of Engakuji Temple or listen to the sound of dripping water at Meigetsuin Temple. Be at ease as you learn the way of Zen in this historical city, the perfect day trip from Tokyo or Yokohama.

title: Private Taxi Tour of Kamakura's Best Temples and Shrines from Yokohama (6 hours)
description: See Kamakura in style during this chartered taxi tour of the ancient capital. See the famous temples and shrines, without worrying about trains or buses!

title: Family Friendly Memorable Kimono Studio Photo Shoot in Nagoya
description: Choose from over one hundred lovely kimonos and transform yourself for memorable photos in a studio. Children, friends and families are welcome for an enjoyable kimono experience.

title: Aromatic Home Decor Crafting Lesson in Nagoya (with English Instructor)
description: Blend a variety of scents to create a small accessory for your room. Relax and take your time decorating and sampling a series of aromas suited for you.

title: Private Kamakura Temples Tour with Tea Ceremony from Tokyo
description:
Visit the ancient temples and shrines of Kamakura, once the capital of Japan. Dive into the serene world of the tea ceremony and capture the essence of Zen, all with a guide who speaks your language.
Kamakura was the capital of Japan before Kyoto, and is still home to an incredible number of historical temples and shrines. Join your English speaking guide and stroll the ancient streets as you visit some of the town's most beautiful temples and shrines. See Meigetsu-in, the 'flower temple,' or Jomyoji Temple, where you can relax with a cup of matcha tea. Check out the bright Tsurugaoka Hachimangu Shrine, an important center of samurai life!
Guides also available in Chinese, Korean, and many other languages.

title: One Day Morinoyu Open Air Outdoor Bath Ticket at Yunessun in Hakone
description: Take a day trip out to Hakone and enjoy bathing with fabulous views of the local scenery. Try the many different baths and soak all day.

title: Pressed Flower and Glass Music Box Workshop in Otaru
description: Arrange lovely pressed flowers as you like to create a unique hanging ornament or music box as a personal souvenir. A flower pressing kit is also included!

title: Beginner Friendly Kiteboard Lesson on Land at Miyako Island
description: Great for first time kiteboarders that want to learn on land with experienced teachers. Practice on the beautiful white sandy beaches of Miyako island!

title: Make Your Own Sushi and Enjoy a Delicious Lunch in Nagoya
description: Get hands on with the instructor and learn to make your own nigiri and rolled maki style sushi. Take your new skills home and eat fresh sushi anytime!

title: Original Pressed Flower Crafting Session in Nagoya (with English Instructor)
description: Create your very own cellphone case or mirror by decorating with beautiful pressed flowers. Select from over 100 kinds of flowers and arrange them according to your preference.

title: Original Handmade Leather Crafting Experience in Aichi
description: Learn to make small items out of leather you can use every day. Relax in a comfortable studio while carefully working to make a coin purse, key case, hair pin and many more.

title: Explore Nagasaki City on a Charter Taxi
description: Historically, Nagasaki has been a city that was a gateway to the countries overseas. Enjoy highlights of the historical buildings of Japan with foreign influences on a taxi.

title: Half Day Glassblowing and Crafting Experience in Tokoname
description: Create your very own unique glass piece. Pick from a glass, pitcher, vase, plate and more! Let your experienced instructor assist you so you can safely make your desired design.

title: Easy Batik Cloth Dyeing Workshop in Kumamoto City
description: Join a batik class, a traditional style of dyeing in Japan. You can easily draw a Japanese coat of arms, animals, or flowers with patterns, to create a unique work of art.

title: Full Day Sightseeing Taxi Tour to Hakodate from Otaru or Sapporo
description: Hakodate is famous for the beautiful night view, said to be worth a million dollars. Enjoy strolling in the exotic town and the many fantastic sights nearby with a chartered taxi tour.

title: Glass Jar Aroma Candle Workshop in Otaru
description: Create a personal aroma candle with cute decorations and your choice of scents either as a treat for yourself or a perfect present for someone else.

title: Kitayamazaki Nature Trekking Tours in Tanohata
description: Enjoy a guided trek through the Kitayamazaki Nature Trail . Choose your desired course, and get splendid views of Iwate's dramatic coastline.

title: Nighttime Giant Flying Squirrel Watching Tour near Lake Kawaguchi
description: Set out at night to find the nocturnal giant flying squirrel! You may be able to see the glide of a wild flying squirrel in the mysterious night forest!

title: Tono Sightseeing Course (3 Hour Private Taxi Charter)
description:
This 3 hour chartered taxi tour will allow you to see all the main sightseeing spots in Tono! Experience the local traditions and explore temples of legend.
Tōno is known throughout Japan as the location of the Tales of Tōno, a compilation of folk tales of the area. This book is now considered one of the greatest studies of Japanese folklore, many of which involve 'kappa', mischievous water sprites said to live in a local pond!

title: Full Day Temple and Yagyu Samurai Village Sightseeing Taxi Tour from Nara
description: Visit an old samurai residence of the former Yagyu feudal clan before paying a visit to a number of ancient temples, living monuments to Japanese history.

title: Nature Walking Tour in the Forests of Koiwai Farm with Entry Ticket
description:
Explore the one hundred year old forest with a nature loving guide in the lush greens of Koiwai Farm. Discover the rich plant life and animals during your walking tour.
Starting with a single tree in the barren field, the Koiwai Farm took over one hundred years to reach its current state. Now you can see a variety of flowers in the spring and leaves changing color in the autumn. The passionate guide will share with you the wildlife and the history of Koiwai Forest.

title: Private Tour of  Hiraizumi by Sightseeing Taxi
description: See all the sights of Hiraizumi and sample the delicious traditional Japanese sweets at Genbikei during this private chartered taxi tour. Great for groups!

title: Special Romantic Cruise For Two from Yokohama
description: For an anniversary, celebration or any special day, charter a cruiser and indulge in a romantic time for two. Add dinner to create a floating night in paradise.

title: Yokohama Bay Cruise featuring Red Brick Warehouses
description:
See the history and industry of Yokohama bay as you cruise and enjoy the views of Minato Mirai, the Bay Bridge, and the huge commercial ships and buildings.
Combine relaxation with a fun learning experience as you see the powerhouses of modern industry and the futuristic buildings of Yokohama Bay before cruising further along, and seemingly back in time to the mid 19th century, where old warehouses and classic buildings represent Japan's past.

title: Airport Transfers and Mini Sightseeing Tour of Hakodate by Private Taxi
description:
Great for both visitors and those on business trips, tour Hakodate and go to or from the airport. A quick one hour tour is perfect to see the main spots!
Still have some time before checking into your hotel, or looking to see the sights of Hakodate before your return flight? Then this is the ideal tour for you! See the beautiful Motomachi churches, or explore Goryokaku Park before or after your flight.

title: Custom Private Sightseeing Taxi Tour from Nagano City
description: Select locations of your choice and customize an original tour around Nagano. Travel at your convenience and make a memorable trip for you and your group up to four people.

title: Half Day Stand Up Paddleboard Adventure Excursion in Numazu
description: Glide over the water on a stable SUP board and enjoy the feel of paddling for a relaxing way to get around while checking out the beautiful scenery.

title: Family Friendly Canoe Adventure with a Mt. Fuji View on Lake Kawaguchi
description: Canoe Lake Kawaguchi, one of the Five Lakes of Mt. Fuji. Great for all ages, this safe tour is a family treat with a special view. Dogs welcome, too!

title: Solo Paragliding Adventure near Tokyo
description: Learn how to glide with an instructor, then run and lift-off! Feel the joy of floating on your own and try something that is completely out of the ordinary.

title: Half-day Private Taxi Exploration of Hongu Taisha Shrine and Nakahechi
description: Customize your pilgrimage route to the famous World Heritage site, the Kumano Hongu Taisha shrine by visiting the surrounding areas on a comfortable private taxi.

title: Craft Your Own Dream Catcher or Mobile in Niseko
description: Create a unique memory of your trip to Niseko with a hand-made souvenir. You can make a dream catcher or a mobile. Both make great decorations!

title: Special Chartered Sightseeing Taxi Tour of the Oiwake Soran Line
description: Set out along the Oiwake Soran Line to Hakodate, Shakotan, or Muroran and see the unique rock faces of the sharp cliffs and mighty peaks.

title: Half Day Snorkeling Tour from Ishigaki Island
description: Explore the beautiful waters off of Ishigaki Island with an easy to join half day tour. Convenient morning and afternoon times make it easy to add to your schedule.

title: Private Sightseeing Taxi Tour of Nagano City
description: Let your experienced taxi driver guide you through the highlights of Nagano. Explore the vast nature along with the history of Japan through temple and castle visits.

title: Comforting 60-minute Foot Massage and Reflexology in Ishigaki Island
description: Relax your legs after a long day of walking around Ishigaki Island. Enhance your blood circulation from the bottom of your feet with a comforting reflexology session.

title: Family Friendly Tropical Snorkel Tours in Ishigaki Island (English Guided)
description: Children 5 and older can join the fun of swimming in the clear tropical waters to see the lively and bright fish swim the reefs during these fun tours with a friendly English-speaking guide!

title: Full Day Coral Reef Snorkeling on Barasu Island from Iriomote
description: Swim in the clear blue waters off the white coral beach of Barasu Island, and discover the amazing reefs on this full day snorkeling adventure.

title: Private Guided One Day Walking Tour of Historical Nara
description:
Let an experienced guide show you the best spots of Nara. Walk through this historical city and get an in-depth explanation of all the temples and sights.
Trace the long history of Nara on a privately guided walking tour through the city. The certified guide can tell you all about the many national treasures, some over 1,300 years old! A great tour for animal lovers, as you can say hello to the many deer wandering the area as you make your way to the old-fashioned town of Naramachi. Walk the alleys where old merchant townhouses are still in use today.

title: Simple Tea Ceremony Experience in Nara
description: Enjoy the taste of green matcha tea, and take a moment to relax while sightseeing! Learn the basics of tea ceremony from the friendly owner.

title: Stand Up Paddleboard All Levels Lessons and Adventure Tours in Miura
description: Stand up on a wide surf board and set out on the water by rowing. Perfect for beginners to experts, this fun tour is a great way to sneak in some exercise while having a good time.

title: Half Day Pressed Flowers Household Goods Workshop in Minakami
description: Take hand made pressed flowers and create a daily use item like a cute key chain or coaster. Each item will commemorate the season with flowers.

title: 7-hour Chartered Sightseeing Taxi Tour from Abashiri to Kushiro
description: This private sightseeing taxi tour can take you to and from Memanbetsu Airport. See Kushiro and pass by Lake Akan, Lake Mashu, Shiretoko and other nearby sights!

title: Full-Day Hiking Expedition to the Summit of Mt. Miyanoura
description: Conquer the highest peak of the Kyushu region and head to the summit of Mt. Miyanoura in Yakushima Island. Enjoy the picture perfect view of the surrounding peaks from above.

title: Half Day Bus Tour to Horyuji and Chuguji Temple Visits in Ikaruga from Nara
description: Take a comfortable bus ride to explore one of the most famous temples of Nara, ancient Horyuji. Trace the history of the Ikaruga area all the way to Prince Shotoku, dating back to the sixth century.

title: Extended Shiratani Unsuikyo Trekking with Taikoiwa in Yakushima Island
description: Take a nice long morning stroll through the forests of Shiratani Unsuikyo before hiking up Taikoiwa. Enjoy the view from above as you leisurely explore the island.

title: Traditional Saori Weaving Experience near Zenkouji Temple in Nagano
description: Learn how to weave using a traditional loom, and create your won one-of-a-kind scarf, tapestry or table runner. Experience the calming effect of weaving in Nagano!

title: Half Day Snorkeling Experience and Swimming in Numazu
description: Discover the mysteries of the undersea world and enjoy a snorkel adventure. If you can not swim, you can still join and relax as you float on the water .

title: Half Day Glass Etching and Sandblasting in Shimoda
description: Etch your personal design onto a glass with a fun sandblasting lesson. Choose the size and color of your glass, then have a smile every time you use it.

title: Full Day Canoe and Snorkeling Combination Tour on Iriomote Island
description: Make for the huge Pinaisara Waterfall in the morning, then snorkel in the beautiful coral reefs after lunch with a full day tour of nature.

title: Full Day Scuba Dive Tours in English for C Card Holders in Ishigaki
description: Relish the sea of Ishigaki, with world famous beautiful waters. Divers of all levels can enjoy exploring the colorful reefs and creatures of Okinawa with an English-speaking guide.

title: Relaxing 60-minute Body Care Massage at Ishigaki Island
description: Treat yourself to a relaxing massage session in a comforting salon on Ishigaki Island. With convenient starting times, enjoy a short or long massage according to your schedule.

title: Chartered Private Sightseeing Taxi Tour to Lakes Akan, Mashu and Shiretoko
description: Set out in a comfortable taxi for the eastern part of Hokkaido, including Utoro, Shiretoko, Kushiro Marsh, and Lake Akan to enjoy the attractions of each season.

title: Relaxing Head and Shoulders Massage Treatment in Ishigaki
description: By stimulating pressure points on your face and scalp, this massage will improve blood circulation and ease tension. Ideal for those with stiff shoulders and tired eyes, come enjoy a moment of bliss!

title: Half Day Canoeing Tour on Kushiro River via Kottaro & Lake Touro from Kushiro
description: Set out for a 4 km canoe up the Kushiro river and a 3 km leg up the Akirenai river to Lake Touro, where you can enjoy canoeing all year round. Relax in the peaceful outdoors.

title: Half Day Natural Stone Accessory Craft Lesson in Minakami
description: Crate an original bracelet, strap, necklace, or other cute accessory using natural stones. Mix colors, designs, and hidden meanings of the stones for a personal touch.

title: Shippouyaki Enamel Accessory Half Day Workshop in Minakami
description: Glaze a cute brooch, pendant, or other simple shape and decorate it as you like. It makes for a great present or memory of your trip, and you can take it home the same day.

title: Half Day Suzu Bell Decoration Lesson in Minakami
description: Draw pictures on earthen bells, a traditional lucky charm to bring fortune in studies, health, or success. Create a cute personal good luck charm.

title: Tickets for Modern Interactive Kabuki Show in Nagoya
description:
Enjoy a modern form of kabuki entertainment at Kabuki Cafe Nagoya Za. Get in on the action as you watch the interpretation of a Japanese myth. Become part of the exciting interactive performance.
Kabuki Cafe Nagoya Za offers the excitement of kabuki entertainment with a modernized, interactive twist. This fun activity allows you to feel like you are part of the performance. Have a seat on your zabuton cushion and get comfortable on the traditional tatami floor. Then enjoy the show with the drink included in the price of your ticket.

title: Private Chartered Half Day Sightseeing Taxi Tour in Nagoya
description: Discover the history and majesty of Nagoya with a private taxi tour to the most famous spots. We have multiple courses for all the highlights of Nagoya. Relax and let us be your guide.

title: Chikuwa (Fish Paste Roll) Making Experience in Tokokawa
description:
Learn how to make a local specialty, yamasa chikuwa, at our shop located in front of Toyokawa Inari Shrine. Form the shape, grill it over charcoal, then enjoy this tasty snack! Meals also available!
Yamasa chikuwa, a specialty of Toyokawa city in Aichi Prefecture, is a must-try for visitors! Learn how to make this delicacy from  experienced Yamato Chikuwa staff, who have 40 to 50 years of experience! Great for families!

We use specially selected ingredients, and do not use Alaskan pollock as many other competitors... and you can taste the difference!

title: Six Hour Sightseeing Taxi Tour of Historic Temples and Castle Ruins in Nara
description: Travel between temples, shrines, castles, and beautiful natural spots on a private taxi tour featuring many of the important cultural properties of Nara.

title: Traditional Japanese Tea Ceremony and Manners Lesson in Nara
description: Learn the basic manners and understand the elegant tradition of sado, the Japanese tea ceremony. Discover a new world of hospitality and tradition.

title: All Ages Ocarina Making Workshop in Minamifurano
description: You make an ocarina using ceramic clay, and enjoy the lovely sound of your hand made instrument. Join with your family and try some of the fresh desserts available too.

title: Half Day Stand Up Paddle Board School in Miura
description: Step onto a stable longboard and paddle your way over the waves. This new sport is a full-body workout enjoyable by a wide range of ages and activity levels.

title: Half Day Stand Up Paddle (SUP) Adventure in Zushi
description: Beginners and non-surfers are all welcome for this fun half-day stand up paddle experience! Skim over the sea, and enjoy a day out on the ocean.

title: Convenient Car Rental Service from Kushiro Airport
description: Drive through the lush green marshlands of summer or the snowy roads in the winter of Kushiro. Venture out to Lake Akan or go out to see wild cranes with a convenient car and English GPS.

title: Kimono Rental and Town Stroll in Romantic Otaru
description: Stroll through the historic town of Otaru while wearing an elegant kimono. From a quick hour to a full day rental, let us help you enjoy Hokkaido.

title: Special Maternity Relaxation Spa Treatment in Ishigakijima
description: This special treatment is approved for pregnant women, to help you relax and sooth any of the effects of pregnancy. Take a moment to unwind and treat yourself while on Ishigaki Island!

title: Traditional Thai Massage Treatment in Ishigaki Island
description: Combining massage with gentle stretches, Thai massage will relax and reinvigorate your body. Indulge in a moment of bliss and feel your stress seep away.

title: All Ages Fishing Tour from Iriomote Island
description: Try your hand at catching the gurukun, a local fish, on a fun all ages tour. Even if it's your first time fishing, have no worries as everything is included.

title: Iriomote, Yubujima, Taketomi, Kohama 4 Island Bus Tour from Ishigaki
description:
See 4 of the Yaeyama Islands in one day. From the mangroves of Iriomote to the charming village of Taketomi, see it all! Lunch is included in a scenic resort hotel with local ingredients.
A great tour for visitors on a schedule, see 4 islands in one day!

Start off at wild Iriomote, and take a cruise through the lush mangrove forests. Cross the shallow waters to Yubujima on a water buffalo cart. Have lunch on rural Kohama, and try traditional Okinawan dishes like 'goya champuru' or 'Yaeyama soba'! On Taketomi check out the Kaiji beach's 'star-sand' and shisa- laden, red-roofed village.

Get a feel for the Yaeyama Islands on this comprehenisive one-day tour.

title: Private Furano and Biei Full Day Charter Tour
description:
Charter your own taxi and relax as the driver expertly takes you to the lavender and colorful flower fields of Furano, or to marvel at the Blue Pond. See what you would like for the day!
Can't drive in Japan, but don't want to join a group tour? Then this is the perfect tour for you. Your licensed taxi guide will happily drive you to see all the beautiful natural sights of the Furano and Biei areas.

title: Handmade Cedar Chopstick Making Experience in Yakushima
description: Using the famous local Yakushima cedar, make your own pair of unique chopsticks under the watchful eye of a friendly instructor. Great as a souvenir of your trip, or as a break from hiking!

title: Cosplay Experience and Photo Shoot in Osaka
description:
Transform into a famous character from Japanese culture or try on a Japanese kimono. Then enjoy a fun cosplay photo shoot against one of eight different backgrounds.  
Have fun dressing up as your favorite characters from Japanese pop culture, or in a kimono. Choose from different scenes and costumes that the studio provides for your own fun, personalized photo shoot. Feel free to change costumes as much as you like and take photos on your own camera as well. Once you've taken your photos, choose one of them to have printed or, for an additional fee, make a calendar of your best shots.

title: One Day Private Guided Taxi Tour of Osaka
description:
Discover Osaka's history,  architecture and cuisine. Swiftly make your way around by taxi and let your guide show you the highlights of this bustling city.
Explore the best of Osaka with your private tour guide as they take you around the city. Begin by learning about the history and notable architecture of the Sumiyoshi Taisha Shrine and the Shitennoji Temple. Go and see the symbols of Osaka in the Shinsekai neighborhood and enjoy the busy streets lined with delicious food and iconic statues. Gaze down at the panoramic view of the city from above at Osaka Castle and the Floating Garden to make yourself feel like a mighty Shogun!

title: Wi-Fi Router Rental with Unlimited Data in Osaka
description:
Be connected, anytime and anywhere with a Wi-Fi router! Update your status on Facebook or tweet from anywhere during your trip to Osaka!        
Connection is available for smartphones and laptops, for up to 10 devices simultaneously.

Receiving and returning the Wi-Fi router is extremely simple. The reserved Wi-Fi router will be waiting for you at your hotel reception desk on the date of your arrival in Japan.To use the Wi-Fi router, follow instructions provided in the kit and make simple adjustments to your device.

To return it, simply place the Wi-Fi router and accessories in the provided return envelope and ask the hotel receptionist to post it for you.

title: Half Day Shiratani Unsuikyo and Yayoi Cedar Trekking in Yakushima
description: Great for beginner hikers or those with a little time left in Yakushima. Explore one of the best highlights of the forests of Shiratani Unsuikyo with a knowledgeable guide!

title: Kushiro Shitsugen Private Taxi Tour from Kushiro Port (3 hours)
description:
Coming into Kushiro Port? Why not see some of the best sights of rural Hokkaido on a 3 hour private tour? Take a walk around Kushiro Shitsugen National Park!

Enjoy a 3 hour course visiting the  Kushiro Marsh Plain Observatory and tree-lined road by Onnenai Visitor Center.

title: Trekking Adventure to Shiratani Unsuikyo Gorge
description: Trek through the World Heritage Site, known for the mossy paths and the colossal cedar trees that even make an appearance in the famous Ghibli movie, Princess Mononoke.

title: Car Rental Service in Yakushima Island
description: Venture around the island of Yakushima on a safe and clean rental car. Comfortably cruise the streets with a built in GPS and enjoy the magnificent views of the island.

title: English Language Food Culture Tour of Osaka around Namba and Dotonbori
description: Check out the huge 'lion' at Yasaka Shrine, look for neat cooking goods and souvenirs at Doguyasuji, get a taste of the city at Kuromon Market and visit the Bunraku Museum on this fun walking tour.

title: Create a Personalized 3D Figure of Yourself
description: Scan yourself and print out a 15 cm tall figure of yourself for a unique memento. Even better than a flat photograph, this captures you in the moment.

title: Open Nature Watching Tour in Nemuro
description: Step into the vast and open wilderness of Hokkaido's Nemuro region, with the huge Lake Furen and seemingly never-ending swathes of wetlands, forest, and more. Half and Full Day courses available.

title: River Cruise Around Osaka Castle and Nakanoshima From the Port of Osaka
description: This round-trip ticket for the Aqualiner will allow you to cruise on the Okawa river. See the amazing architecture and greenery in the heart of Osaka. Board from any of the 4 boarding spots.

title: Samurai (Theatrical Sword Fighting) Class with a Professional Actor in Osaka
description:
Learn the basics of swordplay and the distinctive posture and behavior of the samurai! Professional actors will teach you using actual bamboo swords, like those used in stage performances or films. 
Get a workout and learn not only about swordsmanship, but also how to carry yourself like a samurai.

*Lesson Schedule*

Mondays: 20:00 to 21:00
Wednesdays: 18:30 to 19:30
Saturdays: 19:30 to 20:30

title: Lake Biwa, Mt. Hiei, and Miidera Temple Private Guided Tour from Osaka
description:
Walk the shores of Lake Biwa, visit ancient Miidera Temple at the base of Mt. Hiei and the World Heritage Site of Enryakuji Temple on the mountain.
Escape the hustle of Osaka, and spend the day on the shores of Lake Biwa and slopes of Mt. Hiei. Visit Miidera Temple, one of the Four Great Temples of Japan, with a more than 1,400 year long history. Then ascend Mt. Hiei, an area long considered holy, as you tour Enryakuji Temple, a World Heritage Site. Make sure to enjoy the panoramic views from atop Mt. Hiei, where forested mountain become wide spread city before turning into Lake Biwa, spreading as far as the eye can see.

This private tour will go at your pace, so no need to worry about following a large group or getting lost.

title: Okurayama and Hitsujigaoka Hill Afternoon Tour (with Multilingual Audio Guide)
description:
Hop on board for the best views of Sapporo! Visit Okurayama Ski Jump and view both rural and urban Sapporo at the Hitsujigaoka Observation Hill Lookout.
Two of Sapporo's most lofty sightseeing spots are in store for you on this afternoon tour of the city. With a convenient meeting spot in central Sapporo, visitors will make their way to the Okurayama Ski Jump Stadium, built for the 1972 Winter Olympics.

Upon reaching the stadium, take a cable car to the top of the slope for sweeping panoramas of this beautiful northern city. Gaze down the track and feel like an Olympian!

Next visit Hitsujigaoka Observation Hill and look over the Ishikari Plains and the state-of-the-art Sapporo Dome. Enjoy fantastic views and audio guides in English, Chinese and Korean.

title: Scenic Clear Kayak Tour on Lake Shikotsu
description: Set off on a special clear bottomed kayak and enjoy the scenery around and in Lake Shikotsu. With amazing water quality, you may even spot fish swimming below your kayak.

title: Glassblowing Experience in Kitahiroshima
description:
Try glassblowing and make a glass paperweight, single‐flower vase or cup. Choose any three freely, perfect for small groups and families!
This flexible plan allows you make three glass works of the same type or three different ones. One person can create all three, or three participants can make one piece of art each. 

The glass atelier is located in Kitahiroshima, which is between Sapporo and New Chitose Airport. Relaxing and educational, this is a great way to spend a few hours in Hokkaido!

title: Discount Admission Tickets for JR Tower Observatory in Sapporo
description:
The JR Tower rises 160 meters over Sapporo, directly connected to the station. Enjoy vast 360 degree panoramic views of Sapporo, the Ishikari River, Mt. Teine, and more.
Step into Hokkaido's highest observatory, a full 160 meters above the ground. From the 38th floor you can see the city of Sapporo spread out around you while viewing Mt. Teine or the flowing Ishikari River. At night, the sparkling lights create a magical view. Stop by the T' Cafe and relax in a calming day time cafe or sophisticated night time bar, the perfect way to recharge for the day or wind down into a gentle evening.

title: Tokyo Robot Cabaret Show including Dinner at a Temari Izakaya Restaurant
description:
Spend the night on the town with this package deal with the famous robot show ticket and dinner at an izakaya with a unique temari ball interior nearby the robot restaurant. This izakaya has a wide variety of Japanese food that you can enjoy, and there are quite a few time slots available that would work well with your show schedule.This package includes access to a show at the Robot Restaurant and a dinner at Nanairo Temariuta restaurant. The focus in this restaurant are the round shaped Temari sushi. At the Robot Restaurant, you will enjoy a one-hour cabaret show features a performance by dancing ladies, taiko drummers, ninjas, robots, etc. dancing with lasers and high tempo music.

You can first go to dinner and then see the show, or vice-versa (depending on the option you select at the booking - please see the Important Info tab for details on these options). 

Please choose a dinner plan from two choices below:
*Both plans include 1 glass of drink (beer, wine, or non-alcohol)

Dinner A
Homemade sesame tofu
Caesar salad with smoked bacon and soft boiled egg
Carpaccio of yellowtail with yuzu citrus flavor
Gullied pork with Saikyo-miso source
Assorted deep fried chicken and french fries
Hot pot with seasonal fish and vegetables
Udon noodle
Mille crepes with berry source

Dinner B
Homemade sesame tofu
Turnips pickled gizzard shad
Steamed bun
Jellied broth with crab
Monkfish liver with ponzu sauce
Assorted sashimi of seasonal fish
Salad with squid, mizuna green, and radish with spicy sesame dressing
Grilled beef skirt with garlic
Fried shrimp and taro
Hot pot with assorted seasonal seafoods
Udon noodle
Sweet bun, warabi-mochi(bracken-starch dumpling) with vanilla ice

*Menu is subject to change by season

title: Tokyo Robot Evening Cabaret Show
description:
Prepare for an eclectic evening with a Japanese cabaret show at the Robot Restaurant in Tokyos Kabukicho red-light district! Each entertaining 1-hour show features fun  and sometimes campy  performances full of flashing lights, taiko drums and techno music. See glitzy girls dance with a giant panda, dinosaurs, ninjas and (of course) robots on stage! Your entry ticket includes one drink of your choice (beer, sake, mineral water or soft drink).Arrive 40 minutes early at the Robot Restaurant in the red-light district of Kabukicho for your show (time depending on the option selected). After checking in and selecting a drink, wait in the lounge until you are escorted to your seat for the evening entertainment known as the robot cabaret.

Watch in amazement as neon tanks come out to battle alongside Godzilla, robots, samurais and ninjas. Dancing girls in colorful outfits join dinosaurs and pandas on stage against a backdrop of video screens. Flashing lights, accompanied by taiko drums and loud techno-style music, illuminate the performance of massive female robots  truly a spectacle not to be missed!

Revel in this one-of-a-kind cabaret show for about one hour and enjoy a drink of your choice. Drinks include draft beer, canned beer, sake, canned alcopops, mineral water and various soft drinks. (Additional beverages available for purchase.)
Youll have plenty to rave about at the end of this highly entertaining musical show!

title: 【世界最大海豚秀】名古屋港水族館門票 （中部國際機場取票）
description: 名古屋港水族館是名古屋的人氣景點，以世界最大的海豚秀最為知名，館內除了水族館外，還有南極觀測船、名古屋港海洋博物館、港口大展望台等一共四館，四館共通券可以讓你一天之內都暢遊在各大展館中，一起和可愛的虎鯨、小白鯨、企鵝、海豚玩樂吧！

title: 【川湯溫泉去回】野付半島冰平線漫步體驗・巴士一日遊！
description: 東北海道的盡頭，在冬季的野付半島才看得到的廣闊絕景！「就像來到玻利維亞的烏尤尼鹽沼！」般受人讚嘆的美景，就是野付半島的「冰平線」（Hyohensen）。冬期限定運行的「東北海道高速巴士」和在當地的冰平線體驗行走（約1小時）的套裝行程。

title: 【24hr Airport Transfer】Kansai Airport Osaka / Kyoto ETC fee included
description: ETC fee included👍Special price！＜Kansai Airport⇌Osaka / Kyoto＞Pre-book your professional driver takes you between Kansai Airport (KIX) and your hotel in the comfort of 2-seat, 3~9-seat car.

title: Universal Studios Japan™ VIP Wristband and Abeno Harukas Observatory Tickets
description: Get early access to Universal Studios, get priority entry and beat the lines with a VIP wristband. As an added bonus, the wristband also comes with entry to Osaka’s Abeno Harukas 300 meter Observatory deck.

title: 【美食評鑑推薦】一星的好味道・京都宴席料理餐廳 魚三樓
description: 位於京都伏見的京會席料理老店－魚三樓。擁有一星榮譽。季節推薦京會席套餐贈送飲品一杯，通過KKday預訂才能享受到的福利哦。

title: Tokyo Disneyland or DisneySea Ticket
description: Discover Tokyo's wonderful world of Disneyland or DisneySea. Experience thrilling rides or watch enchanting live shows featuring your favorite Disney characters.

title: 【原宿特色餐廳】週四限定・兔女郎之夜
description: 東京著名的咖啡廳KAWAII MONSTER CAFE，可愛的裝潢、精湛的表演，由特別打扮的兔女郎魅力演出！意想不到的主題餐廳，讓你彷彿愛麗絲夢遊仙境一般，陶醉在這個目眩神迷的神秘世界！

title: 《250cc》輕便型 FORZA Si ・沖繩HONDA機車出租
description: 包車、租車玩沖繩，不夠local，不夠炫！重機愛好者的旅行，當然還是騎重機♬ FORZA Si搭載新開發的馬達，採用水冷四衝程單汽缸，在時速60公里下，每升油試跑41公里。日本職人HONDA新車保證， 價格已含保險。安心度100%

title: Ghibli Museum Tokyo Ticket
description: Explore Ghibli Museum, Japan’s magical storybook world. Step inside a land of fairytales, such as Hayao Miyazaki’s “Spirited Away.”

title: 【京都賞櫻半日遊】高台寺與清水寺夜間點燈・祗園圓山公園・京料理
description: 櫻花季3/30 - 4/8限定行程。京都站出發，在祗園圓山公園享用京料理，並前往夜櫻名所高台寺、清水寺欣賞夜間點燈活動。跟隨本行程可直接入場，無需排隊。超值划算的行程，趕快來體驗！

title: 【JR PASS】東北．南北海道鐵路周遊券（桃園機場取件）
description: 2018 JR 票券新推出！手持 JR 東北・南北海道鐵路周遊券，即可在包括札幌、函館、新千歲機場在內的南北海道地區以及新白河以北的仙台、福島、山形、秋田、青森等東北地區，自由搭乘新幹線以及特急列車。

title: Kyo Sakura Kimono Experience
description: Enjoy a one day kimono experience, wear a traditional kimono and take the perfect selfie while exploring the little streets and stunning monuments of downtown Kyoto.

title: 【Take tour to Tokyo Sumida】Enjoy Yakatabune sumptuous lunch!
description: Yakatabune are traditional Japanese luxury cruise boats,providing the opportunity to enjoy cuisine with friends and family.

title: Kyoto Arashiyama Rickshaw Tour
description: Take a journey through the magnificent Sagano Bamboo Forest and discover Kyoto's best kept secrets on a traditional rickshaw ride with your own personal driver and guide.

title: 《750cc以上》野性的呼喚 CBR1000RR・沖繩HONDA機車出租
description: 前衛的運動型車身，採用鮮豔新穎的色彩塗裝，結合帥氣與美麗的一款！擁有它，你將是眾人矚目的焦點；CBR1000RR來勢洶洶，等你來駕馭。新車保證，價格已含保險、安全帽。安心度100%

title: Chanko Kirishima Restaurant Experience, Tokyo
description: Eat like a sumo wrestler in this unique food experience in Tokyo. Taste chankonabe, a Japanese stew that was eaten in vast quantities to help these burly wrestlers gain weight.

title: Halal Friendly Tour of Tokyo with River Cruise and Mosque Visit
description: Explore Tokyo's highlights including Tokyo Camii, the largest mosque in Japan. Visit the Turkish Culture Center and enjoy a halal lunch. Then see Shibuya's scramble crossing and take a river cruise.

title: Japanese Taiko Drum Musical Performance and Lesson in Tokyo
description:
Feel the beat and energy of the traditional Japanese taiko drum. Watch a live performance then join in to learn the various ways of expressing yourself musically.
Watch a live demonstration by your instructor as you step into the world of Japanese music. Experiment with various types of the taiko drums and learn to play each one. From the colossal drums placed horizontally to smaller drums placed on your shoulder, express yourself through the beats and strokes through the traditional instruments.

title: Japanese Kimono and Yukata Rental and Dressing Experience in Meguro
description:
Dress in a gorgeous retro style kimono or light summer yukata and enjoy free time walking around the classic streets of Tokyo. Take photos in your kimono with beautiful Japanese scenery.
Experience wearing a beautiful vintage Japanese kimono, and enjoy a full day of sightseeing! You will be able to take stunning pictures, and make unforgettable memories of your trip to Tokyo. The kimono studio is located right by Meguro Station, allowing you to easily get to famous sightseeing spots via Tokyo's convenient train system.

title: Chanko Hot Pot Dinner with a Sumo Wrestler in Asakusa
description:
Dine on traditional chanko hot pot and rich black pork with a sumo wrestler in this rare chance to learn and talk about sumo over dinner in Asakusa.
Sit down for a hearty sumo sized and style dinner with an active sumo wrestler. The special prix-fixe menu includes not just the hot pot, but also Kagoshima black pork, a flavorful specialty in high demand. Get friendly with the wrestlers over a tasty meal, and ask all the questions you want to know about sumo in a rare chance to learn the culture from the inside.

title: Romantic Moonlight Dinner Cruise on Tokyo Bay
description:
Perfect for couples, families and friends alike, this is a fantastic way to cruise along the scenic Tokyo Bay and take in Tokyo’s sparkling skyline!
Come aboard and set sail on the Symphony luxury liners, for an unforgettable evening dinner cruise around Tokyo Bay. Enjoy delicious Japanese and French dishes on one of Symphony’s luxurious cruise ships, and feel the wind in your hair as you step out onto the top decks for spectacular views of Japan’s capital city. Meeting at Hinode Station, this cruise takes all the hassle out of an evening on the bay, and offers guests a night of relaxation, comfort, and delicious cuisine.

title: Private English Otaku Subculture Half Day Tour in Akihabara
description:
Step into Otaku paradise,  Akihabara, to stroll through stores loaded with electronics, games, figures, cosplay goods and have lunch at an actual maid cafe!
Originally the main electronics district, Akihabara has blossomed into the center of Japan's otaku subculture. If you are looking for the latest games, figurines rarely seen outside of Japan or the newest anime, then this is the place to go! Your guide can tell you more about the area while helping you find what you are looking for. Explore the hidden sides of Akiba , discover a whole new side of Japan, then go for lunch at a maid cafe' and get your picture taken with one of the cute maids!

Guides are available for English tours, and a wide variety of other languages too!

title: SKY Duck Amphibious Bus Tour of Tokyo
description:
See Tokyo by bus and boat, without missing a beat! Choose from the SKYTREE or Kameido course, and get to know the city and its waterways!
The SKY Duck amphibious bus will take you out to explore Tokyo by land and water, for a very unique view of the city.

See the famous TOKYO SKYTREE and the Kameido area, filled with post-war era homes and popular ramen shops. You can also check out the Kameido Umeyashiki, a beautiful mansion built to look like a wealthy Edo-era home. 

The bus will then splash into the Kyu Nakagawa River, and even make a stop of the 'River Station'. 

Great for kids and adults alike, spend a day on the river!

title: Idol Show Tickets for Alice Project Live Concerts in Akihabara
description:
Get ready to experience the explosive energy and power of the idols of Akihabara! There's nothing to compare to a true taste of this subculture at a special live show!
Cute Japanese idol groups and their fans are a unique part of Japanese pop culture. Usually hard to access for visitors, let us take you into this world of high energy performances! See some of the cutest up-and-coming idols in person at the only Idol Restaurant in Japan.
Alice Project consists of several idol groups : the hard-rocking Alice Juban (Alice No.10), the steampunk Steamgirls, Machikado Keiki Japan, the little fairies of Oz, Pa-Ken, Armor Girls and more! These all-female units hold live performances everyday at P.A.R.M.S Theater in Akihabara, the biggest Idol Theater in Japan.
You can choose the ticket that suits you, from the simple, to an all-you-can-drink plan, or even get in early and enjoy a buffet meal before the dancing and singing begins!

title: Tsukiji Fish Market Tour and Sushi Making Lesson in Tokyo
description:
Get hands on with Japanese culture and cuisine at Tokyo's famous Tsukiji Fish Market! See where the freshest catch is sold, then make your very own tasty meal.
In Japan, the freshest ingredients are used to make the best sushi, and Tokyo’s Tsukiji Market is home to the largest wholesale fish and seafood market in the world. Spend your morning checking out the amazing wholesale market, along with the alleys of noodle shops, produce stands, and fish stalls that make up the area. Then, it's time to put that freshness to the test with a cooking lesson taught by a professional sushi chef. Get hands on and enjoy the most unforgettable treat of sushi- sliced and arranged by your own hands.

title: ALATA Tickets for Non-Verbal Samurai Show in Tokyo
description:
Cheer for Alata, the samurai that traveled through time, landing in 2020 Tokyo. Get tickets for Tokyo's newest show, with thrilling sword acrobatics and high energy dance performances!
The hottest new non-verbal show this summer, ALATA is packed with sword-fighting sequences, modern dance and high-flying action!

Banished to the future by an evil spirit, the samurai Alata arrives in 2020 Tokyo, and promptly gets himself into trouble. He meets Kokoro, a business woman who works in Tokyo, and the two must come together to defeat an evil spirit that has followed him into the future.

Will Alata ever be able to go home? Will he be able to defend himself and Kokoro from both the perils of modern Tokyo and the evil spirit?

Come find out at the Alternative Theater in Yurakucho!

title: Private Airport Transfers between Haneda Airport and Central Tokyo
description: Book a spacious van to make your transfers to/from Haneda Airport easy and stress-free. With space for up to 9 guests, travel in comfort with plenty of space for luggage and free wifi!

title: Mt. Fuji Views, Strawberry Picking and Winter Illumination Tour from Tokyo
description:
View snow-capped Mt. Fuji during a short cruise on Suruga Bay. Enjoy all-you-can-eat strawberry picking, and see the illumination of the "Tunnel of Light" Toki no Sumika. 
After boarding the bus at Shinjuku, you will be taken to each of the tour's locations. Start off in Mitohama for a seafood BBQ lunch. Then hop on the cruise ship for a mini-cruise around Suruga Bay to see an excellent view of snow-capped Mt. Fuji. You can also experience all-you-can-eat strawberry picking and the beautiful illumination display, "Tunnel of Light" Toki no Sumika.

title: Chartered Taxi with English Support Between Haneda Airport and Tokyo
description:
Travel between Haneda Airport and the center of Tokyo on a convenient taxi. Have your personal driver take you door-to-door to your destination, for a hassle-free transfer experience!
After a long flight or business meeting, the last thing you want to do is wrestle your way into a train or wait in a long line at a bus stop. This private transfer service makes getting around a breeze!

title: Mt Fuji, Onsen and Fuji-Q Highland Two Day Tour from Tokyo
description:
Spend two days near Mt. Fuji! Visit the iconic mountain, have fun at Fuji-Q Highland amusement park, relax in a hot spring. Hotel and express bus included.
Choose from round trip or one-way tickets, and overnight at the Highland Resort Hotel and Spa, overlooking Mt. Fuji!

On the first day visit the iconic Mt. Fuji, then be dropped off at the hotel after lunch. Relax in the Fujiyama Onsen, explore the area around Lake Kawaguchi or just relax, its up to you!

On the second day you can go enjoy the rides at Fuji-Q Highland (check out the famous rollercoasters), visit the Fujiyama Museum or go for stroll to explore the natural beauty of the area.

title: Wedding Photoshoot in Hakodate with Private Limousine
description: Take memorable wedding photos at classic locations in Hakodate! Choose from 1 to 2 hours, and enjoy being models for a day in the beautiful retro town.

title: Sights of Famous Writer Hiro Arikawa by Private Taxi
description: See the sights described by Hiro Arikawa in his books, and get a special in-depth understanding of the beauty of Kochi on this private taxi tour.

title: Taisuke Itagaki-Themed Private Chartered Taxi Tour
description: Learn about Taisuke Itagaki, the leader of the Movement for Civil Rights and Freedom in Japan on this chartered taxi tour from Kochi. Great for history buffs.

title: Nagano Countryside Biking Tour to Obuse Town and Hot Spring Visit
description: Explore the beauty of Japan's countryside on a bicycle. Visit the quaint town of Obuse and see the famous phoenix painting of Hokusai. Cap off your day with a soothing bath in a natural hot spring.

title: Three-Hour Budget Taxi Tour of Best Spots in Hakodate
description: Enjoy a short trip of the major highlights of Hakodate on a taxi. Stop by locations such as the Trappestine Convent, Goryokaku Tower and Hachimanzaka for a speedy rundown.

title: Nagano Full Day Tour with Snow Monkey Park Admission and Countryside Cycling
description: Get up close and personal with the famous Snow Monkeys during the green season. Journey through the countryside on a bicycle to enjoy scenic views of rice paddies and orchards.

title: Half Day Guided Summer Small Boat Tour of the Notsuke Peninsula
description:
Enjoy a special atmosphere from a sightseeing boat with a local fisherman who knows the bay. This course is suited for water bird photography or relaxing in the outdoors.

This tour operates from May 1st to October 31st,

title: Full Day Trekking Tour of Top Sights in Shiretoko National Park
description:
See the best sights of Shiretoko, such as the beautiful Furepe Waterfall and untouched forests. This 6km course is appropriate for beginners and kids too!
Our professional guides will take you to all the seasonal must-see sights in this World Heritage Site.  Enjoy the dynamic landscape of Shiretoko's cliffs and the Furepe Waterfall. Gaze at the Oronkoiwa Rock with many flowers blooming (Apr.25~Aug.17), and see salmon and trout going upstream (Aug.18~Nov.15). Explore the untouched primeval forests and breathe in the fresh clean air!

title: Star Gazing Tour in Shiretoko
description: Thanks to the lack of artificial lights, the stars and moon shine brightly over Shiretoko. Gaze at the heaven's, surrounded by the lush nature of the park.

title: White Water Rafting on Tone River, Minakami
description:
Minakami is the ultimate adventure city in Japan with easy access from Tokyo. Located in the sorce of Tone river, considered as one of the “three greatest rivers” in Japan. 
Spring and summer seasons are very different in terms of distance covered on the river and the type of experience, so pick your ideal thrill level.

Spring Whitewater Half-Day Rafting
The Spring Season brings world-class whitewater and high thrills when the mountain snow starts melting. The rapids in Minakami are some of the best in Japan with the main section of over 10kms of grade 3-4 whitewater.

Summer Half-Day Rafting
