Kushiro Shitsugen National Park has the largest wetlands in Japan, and is a wonderful place to get back to nature on this private taxi tour. 
 
Enjoy a leisurely 5 hour tour of Kushiro Shitsugen National Park, for a taste of the stunning natural beauty of Hokkaido!

title: Private Kushiro Marshland Tour from Kushiro Port
description:
Coming into Kushiro Port? Why not see some of the best sights of this rural Hokkaido town on a 2 hour chartered tour? You can even meet local wildlife!

Gaze over the Kushiro River which meanders in the lush marsh from the Hosooka Observatory, and go see Hokkaido's famous white cranes!

title: One Day Hiroshima and Miyajima Tour from Osaka
description:
Head out of Osaka via shinkansen bullet train to visit famous locations in Hiroshima and Miyajima. Stops include the World Heritage Site of the Atomic Bomb Dome, and the floating Itsukushima shrine. 
Dive into the history and nature of Hiroshima on a one day tour. Head out from the city via shinkansen and see the beautiful nature of Miyajima including its wild deer. Take photos in front of the famous floating torii gate of Itsukushima Shrine. Later, visit the UNESCO World Heritage Site of the Atomic Bomb Dome and spend time in the Peace Memorial Park and Peace Memorial Museum to learn more about Hiroshima and this part of its history. 
At the end of your tour, travel back to Kyoto station on the shinkansen bullet train and then be dropped off at your hotel.

title: Scenic Tethered Hot Air Balloon Flight in Furano
description: Lift off in a hot air balloon and rise above the beautiful Furano landscape. Get a panoramic view of the fields with a handy tethering system that will allow you to sail smoothly and safely.

title: Downhill Mountain Bike Adventure with English Guide in Minakami
description: Race into spring, summer and autumn with exciting downhill MTB adventures through scenic Minakami. Tours are adjusted for your level and include an English speaking guide.

title: Full Day Shower Climbing & Hydro Speed Combination Adventure Tour in Minakami
description: Have a full day of thrills with a shower climbing walk in the forest, waterfalls, and natural water slides, then try hydrospeed solo rafting in the river after lunch.

title: Morning Lake Akan Forest Trekking Adventure with English-Speaking Guide
description: Explore the untouched, ancient forests of Lake Akan with your experienced guide. Discover the vast nature and wildlife of Hokkaido while enjoying a short trek to Lake Taro and Lake Jiro.

title: Hokkaido Dairy Farming Experience in Teshikaga
description: Watanabe Farm is certified as a dairy educational farm, and offers experiences like milking, making butter and ice cream, and feeding cows! Great for kids!

title: Guided Forest Walking Tour near Lake Onneto in Akan National Park
description: Follow an English-speaking guide to the best hidden spots near Lake Onneto to capture the glorious views of the lake and the forest. Enjoy a cool summer day exploring the vast forest of Hokkaido.

title: Furano, Biei and Asahiyama Zoo Tour from Sapporo with Multilingual Audio Guide
description:
Check out two of Hokkaido's top summer attractions: Furano's lavender and colorful flower fields and world-famous Asahiyama Zoo! Lunch and round-trip transport from Sapporo included.
This tour offers multilingual audio guidance in Chinese, English, and Korean!
Asahiyama Zoo is one of the most popular zoos in Japan, with special enclosures that allow visitors to get close to seals, polar bears and chimpanzees. The red panda's suspension bridge and underwater penguin tunnel are big hits with kids. Furano and Biei are famous for their fields of flowers, which seem to stretch out forever. All kinds of flowers bloom in Furano but the purple fields of lavender are a must-see in summer. Stroll through the fields and inhale the heavenly scent of the flowers.

title: Guided Mountain Climbing Tour of Ginsendai in Summer
description: Set out on an alpine hike filled with flowers colorfully blooming all around. With courses for all activity levels, this is a great chance to see Hokkaido.

title: Nighttime Nature and Animal Watching Tour in Furano
description: Get away from the city and enjoy stargazing at the night sky and searching for nocturnal animals. Discover a whole different world from the everyday.

title: Snow Field Play Set for Adults and Children near Shin Chitose Airport
description: Located only 10 minutes by car from Chitose Station, get out and play with the powder snow of Hokkaido. Try riding a snow mobile or 4-wheeled buggy, snow rafting, horseback riding and much more.

title: Guided Sapporo Bicycling Tour
description: See Sapporo from the streets on a professionally guided sightseeing bicycling tour. Relax and enjoy a casual day out while still visiting the sights!

title: Johzankei Rafting Adventure from Sapporo with an English-Speaking Guide
description: Raft down the Toyohira River, an area of natural beauty only about 30 minutes from central Sapporo. Enjoy a fun and exciting adventure on the water, and experience the thrill of the rapids!

title: Dairy Farm Experience with Taxi Service from Sapporo
description:
Learn about dairy farming with a hand-on experience for all ages. Meet friendly cows on a peaceful farm, learn how to milk, and make your own butter!
Make your way outside of Sapporo with convenient pick-up and transportation. Head to Murakami Dairy Farm, where 130 head of cattle call the wide fields home. Experience a variety of activities, from milking the cows to making fresh butter, and taste the unique flavor of extremely fresh milk. The farm also has exquisite soft serve ice cream in a variety of flavors, too.

Transportation to and from New Chitose Airport is also available, making this a perfect way to fly in or out from Hokkaido.

title: Sapporo Afternoon Tour of Shiroi Koibito Park and Central Market
description:
Get fantastic views of Sapporo by bus, and visit the famous Sapporo Central Market and Shiroi Koibito Park, with English, Chinese or Korean audio guidance.
Established in 1868, Sapporo is one of the youngest cities in Japan, renowned for its culinary prowess and incredible wintry scenery

Be inspired by the intricate architecture of the ancient Hokkaido Shrine, surrounded by thick forests. Then, indulge your sweet tooth at the Shiroi Koibito Park. Follow up with a visit to the Sapporo Central Wholesale Market, where you can have some of the freshest seafood in the country for lunch.

title: Full Day Tour of Kyoto and Nara from Osaka
description:
Join this full-day tour of Kyoto and Nara! Discover the spiritual richness of these ancient capitals of Japan, play with deer and visit temples and palaces.
Start your day in Kyoto,visiting Nijo Castle, the glowing Temple of the Golden Pavilion, Kitano Tenmangu Shrine and the famous Kyoto Imperial Palace!  Enjoy a Japanese lunch before making your way to the idyllic town of Nara.

Nara is a place saturated with stories of mythology, spirits, and gods. Gaze at Todaiji Temple, home of the world's largest statue of Great Buddha. Stroll with the 1,200 deer of the Nara Deer Park, said to be the celestial messengers of the gods who reside in Kasuga Grand Shrine.

With a hotel-pick up and accompanied transfers, make the most out of your trip to Kansai.

title: All Ages Chartered Kayak and Snorkeling Tour with White Sand Beach from Onna
description:
Enjoy Okinawa with a quiet family tour that combines time on the beach, kayaking, snorkeling, and snack time for a full day of family fun.
Perfect for families from young to old, set out onto the calm and clear water in Okinawa for a fun day swimming, snorkeling, and exploring! Kids can use a special underwater viewer and watch swimming fish and everyone can play together on the lovely sandy beaches!

title: Mother and Daughter Maiko Dress up Photo Shoot in Kyoto
description:
Experience a Maiko or Geisha dress up as a family. Join with another family member to enjoy a professional photo shoot in a studio with the full traditional Japanese outfit. 
Receive 40 shots with different poses with eight 2L-sized photos and 2 photo cards.
Photos will be taken separately and two poses will be together. 
You may select either a Maiko or Geisha outfit.

title: Kimono Dressing Experience for Men in Kyoto
description:
Strike a pose in front of the camera and enjoy a stylish dress up experience during your stay in Kyoto. Transform yourself with a traditional kimono made for men. 
Picture taking in the studio is available for an additional fee. You can also add an optional outdoor stroll with other participants in the Maiko and Geisha plan as well.

title: Two Day Kyoto Train and Hotel Package from Nagoya
description:
This bargain travel package to Kyoto includes Kodama Shinkansen bullet train tickets to and from Nagoya and a hotel in the ancient capital!
Travel to Kyoto by Japan's famous Shinkansen and explore at your own pace with this unguided free plan. Tour the many examples of wonderfully classic architecture, temples, and if you are lucky, see a glimpse of the local geisha as you wander the city.

title: Rock-climbing and Trekking Tour at Mount Konpira near Kyoto
description:
For those who want thrills and excitement after taking in the historical Kyoto, climb to the summit of Mount Konpira. Enjoy the magnificent view of Kyoto and a great workout. 
A new type of activity that fuses rock climbing with trekking: rock-trekking! Feel the breeze in your hair as you scale the mountain. When you reach the summit, you will be greeted with breathtaking views of Kyoto from the top of the mountain.

This adventure is perfect for those who wish to challenge themselves or those who appreciate the gifts of nature. As you get closer to the summit, you will start to feel a great sense of achievement that will overpower any aches in your muscles.

Make this trip one of your fondest memories of Kyoto!

title: Reserved Tickets for Gion Odori Fall Maiko and Geisha Dance in Kyoto (Nov. 1~10)
description:
Witness the lovely grace and artistry of the geisha and maiko of Kyoto during the Gion Odori autumn festival with reserved tickets. You can also join a tea ceremony before the dances!
Step into the splendor of Kyoto where the long tradition of dance and song has been passed down generation to generation. With reserved seating at the Gion Odori, this is a chance to spend an afternoon watching elegant and skilled geisha and maiko perform a variety of songs and dances.

title: Transfer from Kansai Airport to Kyoto Hotels with Staff Escort
description: This airport transfer service will take you from Kansai Airport to your hotel in Kyoto. A staff member will ride with you on the bus, so you don'T have to worry about a thing.

title: Premium Geisha and Maiko Tour of Kyoto with Traditional Lunch
description: Visit charming Gion and Yasaka Shrine, then enjoy delicious Kyoto-style cuisine. To finish the day in style, play traditional teahouse games with a real maiko at an elegant teahouse.

title: Glamourous Oiran Makeover and Kimono Photoshoot in Kyoto
description:
Show a new side of yourself in magnificent and bright kimono. This special photo shoot will leave you feeling like a movie star! Friendly English speaking staff make this stress free and fun, too.
Kyoto may be famous for the reserved geisha and maiko, but the kimonos and styles of the oiran are no less amazing! Using vibrant colors and glamorous makeup, turn yourself into a fashion forward star. Different plans for individuals, friends, and couples are all available, as well as a variety of styles to suit you. If you're looking for something else, a variety of Western styled dresses are also available, covering everything from cheerful kawaii fashion to delightfully dark creations of lace.

title: Solo Paragliding Experience in Katsuyama
description: Learn the basics of the exciting sport of paragliding, and take as many short flights as you want up to 30 meters up! Float though the air, and fee the adrenaline rush!

title: Half Day Guided Trekking in Shirakami Mountain Range to the Anmon Waterfalls
description: The Anmon Waterfall course is a World Heritage site filled with green beech forest and towering waterfalls, the perfect spot for a leisurely hike.

title: Family Friendly Charter Taxi of Wakanai and Soya of Northern Hokkaido
description: Tour around the northernmost area of Wakkanai, including Noshappu Cape, Wakkanai Park, and Soya Cape. Great for those who would like to spend time with family.

title: One-Day Charter Taxi Tour Around Sarobetsu and Wakkanai
description: Spend the day discovering the famous locations of Wakkanai and Sarobetsu on a comfortable taxi. Enjoy the different views of the northernmost point of Hokkaido.

title: Private Sightseeing Taxi Tour of Highlights of Wakkanai
description: Tour around the northern city of Hokkaido, from Wakkanai Park, Noshappu Cape, and Kitabo dome. Explore various highlights of the city on a comfortable taxi.

title: Kimono Rental and Dressing in Miyama
description: Get dressed in a colorful kimono and explore Miyama, famous for its Satsumayaki pottery. With lots of different prints and colors to choose from, you are sure to find the perfect kimono to suit you

title: Bridal or Engagement Kimono Photography in Fukuoka
description:
Perfect for engagements, weddings or anniversaries.
Capture your special memories on camera, during this Japanese-style wedding photo shoot!

title: High Thrill Flyboard Experience on Toyama Bay
description: Hop on to a flyboard and lift off on a powerful jet of water. Experience a brand new feeling as you hover, swoop and play on the lovely Toyama Bay.

title: Canyoning Adventure in Kurobe or Jinzu River
description: Climb up or slide down a refreshing river. Enjoy the exciting adventure with your experienced canyoning guide as you feel the power of nature up close.

title: Night Tour of the Former Pirate Stronghold Toba Castle in Mie
description:
Explore the castle town of Toba at night! See the Toba Castle ruins, which were once the stronghold of an army of Japanese pirates. While you explore the town you can eat one of the local delicacies!
Meeting spot only 5 minutes on foot from Toba Station.

title: Overnight Campsite Rental in Tateyama
description: Throw your tent up at an ocean-side camping site and enjoy the feel of nature all around. Hike, play in the sea, go fishing, or just relax outside.

title: Half Day BBQ Space Rental in Tateyama
description: Reserve all the grills and space you need, from a group of four or five up to 250 people. We prepare the grills, tongs, and prep space, you bring the food and your appetite.

title: Hiroshima and Miyajima Tour from Osaka with Return Train to Kyoto
description:
Venture through Hiroshima to discover the history and culture at iconic locations such as the Atomic Bomb Dome and Itsukushima shrine with convenient transfers from Osaka and Kyoto.
Set out from the busy metropolis of Western Japan, Osaka, and get into the history and nature of Hiroshima on a one day tour that includes the UNESCO World Heritage Site of the Atomic Bomb Dome. Head out from the city and look forward to seeing wild deer in the untouched abundant nature of Miyajima. Finish off your tour in Kyoto, where ancient buildings and temples stand in the former capital of Japan.

Cherry blossoms blooming season: End of March to the beginning of April

title: Kobe Sightseeing and Nada Sake Brewery Walking Tour from Central Kobe
description:
Head for Kobe to see the city highlights, and out to Nada, where Japanese sake is lovingly brewed by masters of the craft on a full day tour.
From high rises to gentle parks, Kobe is home to a huge variety of wonderful spots, and your guide is out to show them off! After a buffet lunch, head out to Nada, where Japanese sake is carefully brewed, and enjoy both a tour and tasting.

title: Full Day Rafting and Ducky Ride on the Yoshino River in Miyoshi
description:
Combine the thrill of large and small boats with a full day of rafting and the new ducky! Get close to the water from the 2 person ducky, and ride the waves.
We also offer free photo and video service! No need to worry about keeping or copying a DVD, we upload the data straight to a special website, and provide participants with access to their tour's photos and pictures. You can download them at your convenience!

title: Half Day Ninja Forest Adventure Course in Hida with English or French Guide
description: Challenge the high rise obstacles in a tree top course and become a quick and agile ninja, then ride along exciting zip lines. Courses for all ages available.

title: Guided One Day Mt. Tokachimitsumata Summer Climbing Tour
description: Climb and hike Mt. Nipesotsu, one of the 200 famous mountains in Japan. Between the open skies, wildflowers, and bountiful greenery, it will feel like another world.

title: Reserved Lake Ashi Sightseeing Cruise Ticket in Hakone
description: Enjoy the scenery of Mt. Fuji and Lake Ashi from the ship as you cruise between Hakone-Sekisho-Ato Port, Moto-Hakone Port, Hakone-en Port and Kojiri Port!

title: Otaru and Nikka Whisky Tour from Sapporo
description:
This relaxed tour to the retro town of Otaru and multi-award winning Nikka Whisky Distillery is a great day trip from Sapporo. During certain months fruit-picking is available too! 
Masataka Taketsuru, also known as the father of whisky in Japan, brought Scottish whisky making to Japan, and refined the craft. Nikka Whisky won the 2008 World Whiskies Award, so enjoy a glass of Hokkaido's finest!

In July, September and October pick the bountiful harvest of the lovely fruit orchards of Yoichi and Otaru, featuring spring and summer cherries through August, followed by juicy plums until September. Grapes and apples burst into color and full flavor from September until October.

This tour also offers English and Chinese language audio guidance!

title: Guided Koiwai Backyard Tour by Bus (Entry Ticket Included)
description: Depart from Koiwai Farm on a comfortable bus and let your experienced guide teach you about the history of forestry and take you to dairy farms normally not open to the public.

title: Advanced Kiteboard School Lessons in Kagoshima
description: Master the skills to kiteboard or improve your riding with a selection of private, technical, or complete lessons. No matter your style, we are here to help you improve.

title: Kanzaki River Canyoning Adventure in Higashiomi
description: Join a canyoning adventure and go down the mountain stream. There are fun spots to dive into the water, so you can stay cool as you have fun! Great for first timers and young children.

title: Private Taxi Tour of Hiroshima's Best Sights
description: Visit Hiroshima Castle, Shukkeien, and gaze at the view of the Seto Inland Sea from Hijiyama Park. Stroll through Hiroshima Peace Memorial Park on this taxi tour!

title: Himeji Castle and Akashi Kaikyo Bridge World Heritage Walking Tour from Osaka
description:
Visit one of Japan's most iconic World Heritage Sites, Himeji Castle! Experience Akashi Kaikyo Bridge, the world's longest suspension bridge.
Head out from Osaka and jump into history in Himeji. Take a stroll around the vast grounds of Kokoen and enjoy the beautiful scenery of this historic Japanese garden with Himeji Castle nestled away in the surrounding landscape.

Cherry blossoms blooming season: End of March to the beginning of April

title: Tokoname Pottery Lesson for All Ages in Aichi
description: Create your very own traditional Tokoname ware using techniques dating back all the way to the twelfth-century. Using special methods, make your very own table ware.

title: Personalized Surfing Lesson for Beginners in Ichikawa
description: Join a professional instructor as they provide a lesson that takes your strengths into account. You can learn the basics of surfing while enjoying the sea.

title: Kumagawa River Whitewater Rafting Adventure from Hitoyoshi
description: Take a thrilling ride down the rapids of Kuma River and splash through the whitewater currents with your guide! Great for friends and family of all ages!

title: Sightseeing Taxi Tour of Tono
description: Tono was made famous by its local legends, and the charming rural beauty of the town. Visit the Gohyakurakan, Suikouen and more on this private taxi tour!

title: Overnight Hiroshima Bullet Train and Hotel Package from Nagoya
description:
Head to Hiroshima from the centrally located Nagoya! With bullet train tickets and one night in a hotel included, let us take the hassle out of traveling!
This two day, unguided free plan package includes heavily discounted round-trip bullet train tickets from Nagoya to Hiroshima with one night's accommodation in your choice of hotel in Hiroshima. See the floating torii of Miyajima, taste the delicious local okonomiyaki or visit the Atomic Dome, this package allows you to enjoy Hiroshima at your own pace.

title: Wooden Top Painting Experience in Morioka
description: Paint a traditional wooden top in bright colors, and watch as they blend together as it spins! A fun activity for kids, make a unique souvenir of Morioka.

title: Nahra River Adventure Canoe Tour on Iriomote
description: Get outdoors on a full day combination of canoeing through mangrove forests and trekking in the jungle in the tropical paradise of Okinawa's Iriomote Island.

title: Izuhakone Line 1-day and 2-Day Pass (RAIL & BUS) Tickets for Travelers
description:
Enjoy riding the Izuhakone Line trains and buses with a special discounted pass. With unlimited rides, you can explore stunning Shizuoka at your pace.
The ticket is easy to use. When you ride the Izuhakone Line trains, simply enter at the manned ticket gates and you're ready to go. Riding the Izuhakone buses is just as easy, simply show your ticket to the bus driver when you get off at your stop and you're done.

[Special Offer]
You can go to Izu-Mito Sea Paradise using this ticket.
If you show Izuhakone Line 1-day/2-day Pass, you can enter Izu-Mito Sea Paradise for a special price of JPN1,200.

title: Overnight Mt. Fuji & Hakone Bullet Train Tour with Accommodation at Hotel Okada
description: Hop on the bullet train in Tokyo, for two days of sightseeing and relaxing around Mt. Fuji and Hakone. Stay at a 5-star hot springs hotel, and enjoy a cruise on Lake Ashi too.

title: Full Day Izu Peninsula Chartered Sightseeing Excursion from Mishima City
description: Enjoy the natural beauty of mountains, waterfalls, and more as you travel through the Izu Peninsula in a chartered taxi. End your journey at a hot spring inn.

title: Two Dives in Tago or Atami from Tokyo
description: Choose from Tago and Atami, and enjoy a whole day of diving with convenient central pick-up and drop-off service. Check out the guides' recommended spots.

title: Historical Tour of Ogasawara Island and Battle Memorials
description: Learn about the history of the rocky cliffs of Ogasawara, home to many remnants of war and history, both ancient and in more recent times.

title: Special Geisha Performance and Games in the Heart of Tokyo
description:
Now is your chance to meet true geisha in Tokyo. See an elegant dance, play classic parlor games and take pictures with these icons of Japanese hospitality with helpful English support.
Come meet the elegant geisha of the Nihonbashi Yoshicho district for a unique experience of Japan's culture of 'omotenashi' hospitality. While it is usually very rare for visitors (or even locals!) to be able to enjoy the dance and entertainment skills of a geisha, this plan allows you a look into this different world. Watch as they perform a beautiful traditional dance, then play a few popular drinking games before you finish up your evening by taking a picture with the geisha for an indelible memory of your visit to Tokyo. Explanations will be in both English and Japanese, making it easy to learn and understand the deep culture of Japan.

title: Mount Fuji and Hakone Bus Tour with Tokyo Departures and English Guide
description:
Hop aboard a comfortable motorcoach as you head out from central Tokyo. Treat yourself to wonder with this full day tour of Mount Fuji and Hakone, along with an included lunch.
Mount Fuji is a revered cultural and religious icon in Japan. You will feel the majesty of the mountain as you drive through Tokyo’s countryside, then ascend 2,300 meters to Mount Fuji’s 5th Station. Breathe in the crisp mountain air, check out the shrine and gaze at the distant peak. The afternoon is filled with photo opportunities, all with Mount Fuji as the perfect backdrop! Take a leisurely boat ride on Lake Ashi, then ride up Mount Komagatake on the Hakone Ropeway for panoramic views of the iconic vista framed by nearby mountains.
Departing straight from the Shinjuku Keio Plaza Hotel, this reasonably priced tour is a great way to visit Mt. Fuji without the hassle of dealing with train schedules.

title: Japanese Musical Experience Koto Lesson in Tokyo
description:
Step into the world of Japanese traditional music through this koto lesson. Get familiar with the beautiful instrument and learn how to play a simple piece!
Get in touch with the sounds of traditional Japan, with this unusual chance to take a koto lesson.

The koto is a traditional musical instrument, a 13-stringed horizontal zither similar to the harp. You play it using finger picks (called tsume) on the right thumb, forefinger, and middle finger. The koto has a lovely nostalgic tone and leaves lingering echos of sound.

There are lots of modern and fusion koto music pieces, as you can tune the chords however you like, making it a very versatile instrument.

title: Japanese Tea Ceremony in the Heart of Tokyo
description:
This special ceremony takes place in a tea room in the heart of Tokyo, and provides guests an unforgettable opportunity to learn the Japanese art of tea!
Sado ("Way of Tea") is an ancient tradition that teaches the ceremonial preparation and presentation of matcha, Japanese green tea. Learn about Japanese culture through this time-honored, traditional tea ceremony. Visitors begin their tour at the bustling Tokyo Station, the busiest station in all of Japan, before being escorted to a  Japanese tea room. The relaxing and peaceful nature of this activity will allow guests to escape the hustle and bustle of Tokyo life, providing a sense of serenity and well-being while experiencing the heart and soul of Japanese culture!

title: Ghibli Museum Tickets and Afternoon Tour of the Magical World of Miyazaki
description:
Relive the magic of Studio Ghibli films as you tour the whimsical museum. Dedicated to some of Japan’s most beloved works of animation, straight from the mind of Hayao Miyazaki.
Jump into a world of magic and wonder on this tour of the Ghibli Museum and let yourself get lost in the works and scenes from favorites such as My Neighbor Totoro, Kiki’s Delivery Service, Ponyo, and Princess Mononoke! This enchanting maze-like museum was personally designed by Hayao Miyazaki, with the aim of letting guests "find their way" through the labyrinth. Imaginative exhibits take you through the process of making animated films alongside sculptures and scenes from the films. An original short written and directed by Miyazaki himself is also shown in the Saturn Theater.

title: Best of Tokyo Full Day Guided Tour with Lunch, Tea Ceremony and Hotel Pick-Up
description:
See the best Tokyo has to offer on this one day adventure of Japan's capital. Visit Asakusa, the Imperial Palace and Tokyo Tower, and experience a tea ceremony and river cruise!
Tokyo is a city of beautiful contrasts, and this tour provides the opportunity to compare old Tokyo with the vibrant, modern city it is today! This one day tour, with an accredited English speaking guide, is a great way to see Tokyo’s most famous sights, from the bustling Sensoji Temple in Asakusa to iconic Tokyo Tower and the serene grounds of the Imperial Palace.
Watching is no way to understand the culture, so get active and join a traditional tea ceremony, browse the colorful shops lining the Nakamise walkway, and gaze upon panoramic views from atop Tokyo Tower. You can even drive through the heart of Ginza, the world-famous shopping district with bright lights and neon signs. A Japanese lunch and cruise on the Sumida River are included, to make sure you get a feel for Tokyo from all angles.

title: Visit Mt. Fuji, Hakone and Cruise on Lake Ashi with a Full Day Tour from Tokyo
description:
Visit Mt Fuji on this tour to visit the iconic mountain. Gaze at snowy Mt. Fuji, take a cruise on Lake Ashi in charming Hakone and ride the ropeway. Choose to return by bus or bullet train.
Escape the hustle and bustle of Tokyo and head out across the countryside to visit Japan’s most iconic natural landmark, Mount Fuji! Stop at Mount Fuji 5th station to enjoy sweeping panoramas from 2,300 meters above sea level. After a refreshing lunch, visitors will be taken on the Sky Gondola, for 360-degree views of the volcanic Hakone Mountains. While in Owakudani sample a local treat, black shelled eggs boiled in the sulfurous spring water, which are said to prolong your life by 7 years! This full day adventure comes to an end with your choice of transportation back to Tokyo, by bus or the famous bullet train. Drop offs in Odawara are also available.

title: Private Tour of Tokyo Shopping Districts
description:
An English-speaking guide/driver will escort you to the heart of Tokyo's shopping districts. Visit electronics mecca Akihabara, the luxury stores of Ginza, or the trendy shops of Shibuya.


Get ready to shop until you drop in the heart of Tokyo, where vast streets filled with stores are sure delight every traveler with any range of interests. 

Explore Akihabara, heaven for those who love electronics, the latest gadgets and anime. Wander through Ginza, a luxury shopping capital, to find hot designer labels from all over Japan and the world. Visit Shibuya, a busy commercial center among brightly lit buildings outfitted with numerous LCD screens.

You can visit one location or a mix of all of the above depending on your schedule. Find countless fun gifts and souvenirs on this private Tokyo shopping tour.

title: Full Day Shodoshima Island Nature Sightseeing Bus Tour from Tonosho Port
description: Explore this quaint island in Kagoshima on a comfortable sightseeing bus. See the famed spots where the movie "Twenty-four Eyes" was filmed along with the lovely olive park.

title: Kumejima Island Boat Diving for Licensed Divers at Two Points
description: Explore the world under the clear blue waters of Kumejima Island. Let your experienced guide take you to the best points to see colorful tropical fish and wonderful marine life!

title: Beginner Friendly Expedition on a SUP around Miyako Island
description:
Spend time leisurely cruising around the sea of Miyakojima on a stand up paddleboard. Learn this popular water sport and explore the tropical Okinawan island.
Hop aboard a stand up paddleboard and learn to maneuver around to safely cruise the clear blue waters. Friendly instructors will guide and teach you to handle the SUP. Comfortably make your way as you discover the wonderful areas of Miyako island. Visit white sandy beaches, lush green mangroves and magnificent coral reefs. Enjoy this fun water sport that's great for people of all ages.

title: All Season Bungy Jump From the Ryujin Bridge in Hitachi Ota
description: Leap from the highest bungy jump in Japan and discover the Dragon God of Ryujin as you race towards the water of the lake with the ultimate in adrenaline rushing thrill.

title: Colorful Kimono Rentals in Kagoshima City
description: Explore the sights of Kagoshima all dressed up in a gorgeous kimono! Choose from a wide selection of prints and obi belts, to create a personalized look.

title: Organic Buckwheat Soba Noodle Cooking Experience in Saga City
description: Cook up delicious soba noodles from scratch. Use organic buckwheat from the Nishiyamada farm and make your very own healthy noodles to taste on the spot.

title: Private Six Hour Oboke and Iya Valley Sightseeng Chartered Taxi Tour
description: Head for the hard to reach spots of the Oboke and Iya Valleys with a comfortable ride in a chartered taxi driven by a knowledgeable local guide.

title: Matsuyama Temples and Castle Haiku Tour with an English Guide
description: Relive history by visiting Ishiteji, one of the 88 temples of the Shikoku Pilgrimage and learn how to write haiku! Slip back in time at Matsuyama Castle, and discover the haiku mind with your guide.

title: Horse Back Riding and Trail Riding Experiences in Taketa
description: Get to know our friendly horses with special plans for kids and ladies. You can ride solo or be lead by an instructor for extra security. You can even stay and have lunch at the stables!

title: Full-Day Private Taxi Tour of Famous Kanazawa Highlights
description: Have your English speaking driver take you through the ancient city of Kanazawa. Spend your time exploring popular locations such as the Kenrokuen Garden or the Kanazawa castle comfortably.

title: Private Taxi Tour of Yanagawa City to/from Fukuoka and Saga
description: Discover the history of Yanagawa city and World Heritage site, Mie Tsu Naval Base remains. Customize your tour with destinations either to cities or airport transfers in Saga or Fukuoka.

title: Japanese Paper Making Experience in Gokayama
description: Make washi paper in a traditional paper-making village. The class is held in a traditional 'gassho zukuri' house, surrounded by the lush mountains of Toyama.

title: Half Day Horseback Riding Adventure in Akita
description: Enjoy the vast nature of northern Mt.Choukai as you stroll around on a horse. Learn to ride these friendly creatures and explore the area with your friendly guide.

title: Island Sightseeing with a Chartered Taxi on Shodoshima Island
description: There are many narrow mountain roads on Shodo Island, so avoid the hassle of driving, and let the experienced driver take you around the area in safety and comfort.

title: Make Your Own Sanuki Udon Noodles in Kotohira
description: Learn the traditional and a fun modern way of making udon noodles in Kagawa, the capital of udon noodles! Once you are done, enjoy them for lunch. Great for kids of all ages.

title: Reservations for Owl de Base Owl Cafe in Hiroshima
description:
Have fun interacting with owls, falcons and hawks at Hiroshima's first owl cafe, Owl de Base. Take photos with the owls and have your favorite bird perch on your  arm. 
Learn from the staff how to interact with the owls in the cafe and then enjoy your time in the owl room. Feel free to take flash-free pictures of the owls. If you pick a favorite, you can ask the staff to assist you in having the bird perch on your arm. For an extra 300 yen, you can also feed the owls in the morning or afternoon.

title: Full Day Unlimited Paragliding Experience Above the Tottori Sand Dunes
description: Spend your entire day soaring above the grand desert-like sand dunes of Tottori with your paraglider. Great for people with loads of energy! Enjoy flying all day as many times as you like.

title: Traditional Nikko-Style Wood Carving Experience in Nikko
description: Learn how to do Nikko-bori, the traditional wood craft of Nikko! Create your own frame, box or hand mirror using techniques that have been passed down since the Edo Era, and create a unique souvenir.

title: Ikebana Flower Arranging Lesson in English or French in Saitama
description: Take seasonal flowers and plants to make a beautiful floral arrangement. Learn the traditional techniques while discovering the importance of flowers in Japanese culture.

title: Full Day Surfing Skills Lesson in Ichikawa
description: Professional instructors provide attentive lessons to help you improve your riding. Whether a beginner or out of practice join in and get back on the water.

title: Private Walking Tour of Little Edo in Kawagoe
description:
Discover the history of Tokyo through Kawagoe's merchant houses in this former castle town. Walk the streets of Little Edo and step into history.
Slip back in time and wander through the vintage streets of Kawagoe with many landmark buildings that are several hundred years old. Your guide will walk you through the stone paved nostalgic streets with traditional houses, massive temples and merchant shops. Let yourself feel like a kid again at the Candy Alley where fresh candy and treats are made on the spot like the good old times. Pick up a few snacks and enjoy the atmosphere of Little Edo.

title: Treetop Climbing and Ziplining at Forest Adventure Chichibu
description:
Play between the treetops on cables and ladders, then slide down a zip line for an adrenaline rush in the forests near Tokyo! Feel like Tarzan!
This exciting treetop adventure course is built at the foot of Mt. Fuji in Yamanashi, and you can enjoy views of the iconic mountain from high up in the trees! Climb across rope ladders, zipline from tree to tree and spend your day surrounded by the lush green forest. The best thing about Forest Adventure is that it uses the natural forest. Therefore, unlike a typical amusement park, it does not have a large impact on the environment and the damage is minimal.

title: Historic Kurayoshi Townscape Sightseeing Taxi Tour from Yonago
description: Many buildings in this area are constructed in the Edo and Meiji periods stand, creating a picturesque scene. Visit a museum dedicated to the hit mange series Case Closed, as well.

title: Onsen Hot Springs and Shopping Tour by Sightseeing Taxi from Yonago
description: Soak yourself in Kaike Onsen then enjoy shopping at the large Tenmaya Department Store before checking out lovely downtown Tottori from a comfortable sightseeing taxi.

title: Preserved Plum Cooking Lesson in Wakayama
description: Make your very own traditional umeboshi pickled plum or juice using large Nankou Ume plum from the Kishu region. Take a tour around the factory and taste freshly made products.

title: Half Day Historic Nagashibina and Castle Town Chartered Taxi Tour from Tottori
description:
Directly experience the history of Tottori including the unique Nagashibina, paper dolls that float in the river, and the classic landscape of a mountain town.
Nagashibina no Yakata is a rare large wooden building in modern Japan. Made with 15 logs of 50-60cm in diameter, the exhibition room features more than 800 dolls dating from the Edo era.

Itaibara Shuraku features Sakaibara, said to be the original scenery of the mountain village of Japan. Step into a quiet tea shop Nodokou, built in a restored private house. In the space where time seems to stop, relax and breathe the mountain air as stress melts away.

The Ishitani Residence is a large-scale modern Japanese-style building in Chizushuku, and was once the residence of a family that became the head of the village.

title: Horse Back Riding Experiences for All Levels in Taketa
description: From quick 1 hour lessons to 5 hour trail rides, find the perfect riding experience to enjoy during your visit to Oita. Friendly horses and instructors welcome you!

title: Heian Period Costume Experience in Nachi
description: Try out the elegant outfits worn by pilgrims during the Heian period, for cool pictures. Take a walk around Mt.Nachi, and experience the Kumanokodo Route in a whole new way!

title: Surfing and Body Boarding Day Trip from Ichikawa
description: Let our instructor guide you to the best point of the day. Enjoy playing in the sea all day and have fun riding the waves or relaxing on the beach.

title: Seven Deities of Good Fortune Pilgrimage Sightseeing Taxi Tour
description: The Seven Deities of Good Fortune are each said to bring great luck in their areas. Trace the pilgrimage route in a comfortable taxi and test it yourself.

title: Kaga Onsen Can Bus Hop-on Hop-off Tickets (1 and 2 Day)
description: Hop on the easy Can Bus and enjoy the simplest way to get around the attractions in Kaga Hot Spring Resort. Both routes start from JR Kaga Onsen Station for your convenience.

title: Himeji Castle and Akashi Kaikyo Bridge World Heritage Walking Tour
description:
Visit one of Japan's most iconic World Heritage Sites, Himeji Castle! Experience Akashi Kaikyo Bridge, the world's longest suspension bridge.
Take a stroll around the vast grounds of Kokoen and enjoy the beautiful scenery of this historic Japanese garden with Himeji Castle nestled away in the surrounding landscape.

Cherry blossoms blooming season: End of March to the beginning of April

title: Professional Kimono Dressing and Photo Shoot Experience in Kanazawa
description:
Take the chance to dress in beautifully styled Japanese kimono in Kanazawa! Have an indoor or outdoor professional photo shoot to capture the memories forever.
Get dressed in the kimono of your choice and take beautiful pictures in Kanazawa! Choose from a wide selection of stylish kimonos in a massive variety of fashions, materials, and colors. The knowledgeable staff will help you find the type that best suits you, and assist in getting you ready for your professional photo shoot. After that, feel free to walk the old streets of Kanazawa while in your kimono. Graceful and historic buildings line the streets, and it will feel like you have stepped back in time.

title: Special Sake Tasting Course with 28 Brands in Kumamoto City
description: Relax in a 100 year old retro yet modern shop and taste the famous high quality sake of the region. The shop owner is a sake sommelier, and is happy to help you discover the world of Japanese liquor.

title: Private Three Hour Oboke and Iya Valley Sightseeing Taxi Charter Tour
description: Discover the highlights and hidden spots alike in the Oboke and Iya Valleys with a privately chartered three hour taxi tour with a knowledgeable guide.

title: Make Your Own Sandblasted Etched Glass Art in Otaru
description: Design, lay out, and etch your own frosted glass art piece to create a memorable and entirely unique souvenir of your visit to beautiful Otaru.

title: Private Taxi Tour to Historical and Legendary Spots of Tottori
description: Trace back the historical sites from the Warring States Era to the Meiji Revolution to discover how Tottori came to be. Or learn about the culture through folk tales and romantic sites.

title: Silver Ring of Bangle Making Lesson near Yokohama
description: Just a short walk from Hakuraku Station, learn to create rings or bangles, using original patterns or engraving. Great as a present for a special present or to make wedding rings with your partner!

title: Charter Taxi to/from HUIS TEN BOSCH in Sasebo City
description: Spend your time exploring and enjoying the activities within HUIS TEN BOSCH with comfortable taxi transfers from either Nagasaki, Fukuoka or Hirado city.

title: Small Group Soba Noodle Cooking Class in Nagoya
description: Discover the secrets behind creating one of Japan's most recognizable dishes. Learn how to prepare soba noodles from an expert guide and help yourself with freshly made noodles after the class.

title: Wild Bottlenose Dolphin Watching Cruise in Amakusa
description: Set out the see the 300 bottlenose dolphins that love offshore of Amakusa. The dolphins are very friendly and come close to the boat to swim and play!

title: Private Guided Walking Tour of Toshogu Shrine in Nikko
description:
Walk through the temples and shrines of Nikko to discover the history and craftsmanship of the Toshogu Shrine, built by the first Shogun of Japan!
Explore the sacred sites of the Toshogu Shrine, built back in the 1600s by Ieyasu Tokugawa. Feast your eyes upon the craftwork of the best artists, gathered together to create this beautiful shrine. Learn the story behind the wooden carvings, metal works and paintings that are displayed.
Your guide will also take you through the many halls of Rinnoji Temple and Futarasan Shrine, which housemany national treasures, to complete your World Heritage tour of Nikko.

title: Private Custom Taxi Tour of Yokohama with an English-Speaking Guide
description:
This special private tour around Yokohama allows you to customize your itinerary! With an English-speaking guide by your side, navigate the sights with confidence and see the city your way.
Get around the language barrier and tour around Yokohama's best sights with your very own private English-speaking guide. Visit places only locals know or let your guide create a unique itinerary of places that fir you and your group's interests!

title: Private Sightseeing Tour of Hanamaki's Treats or Crafts by Taxi
description: See all the best sights of charming Hanamaki while also learning about local crafts and delicacies! Great for groups or visitors with limited time to explore.

title: Five-Hour Historical Private Taxi Tour of Kanazawa
description: Conveniently travel on a chartered taxi and tour around Kanazawa. Explore the city with your friends and family with an English speaking driver to assist you to your destination.

title: Family Friendly Plastic Food Sample Making in Shirotori
description: This fun and friendly store will teach you to make a perfect Japanese food sample. Create a one of a kind plastic item that looks just like the real thing! Great for families with kids ages 3 and up.

title: Half Day Onsen Resort Hot Spring Bath and Local Cuisine in Gero
description: Discover a hidden local gem, with naturally carbonated hot spring waters. Bathe in the baths and enjoy dishes made with the mineral waters too.

title: Ceramic Art Experience in Beautiful Kita Kamakura
description: Let your creativity go wild and create your own unique pottery vessel in this fun, beginner friendly pottery class near the famous Kamakura!

title: Tempura Plastic Food Sample Making Experience in Central Nagoya
description:
Create your very own realistic looking shrimp and vegetable tempura with wax and plastic. Surprise your friends back home with all sorts of fake foods that look good enough to eat.
Frequently seen in Japanese restaurants, plastic food displays have become a popular form of art in Japan. Now you can experience making your very own realistic tempura assortment using plastic supplies. At the shop, you can also pick-up various fake dishes to take home as gifts or souvenirs.

title: Special Entry for the Hot Spring Theme Park Yunnesun in Hakone
description:
Make your way to the amazing hot spring theme park. Enjoy a dazzling variety of pool-sized baths, a water slider bath for kids, and a unique wine, sake, or green tea bath for adults.
Soak in a variety of pools with no need to be shy. All guests will wear bathing suits, so you can enjoy without worry!
Stretch out your legs and have a blast in a giant tub filled with wine, sake, coffee, and many more thematic baths. 
Make sure to join in on the fun bath enhancer performance where you can be showered in coffee or wine. Spend a wonderful day relaxing in the baths with something to talk about back at home.

Rental swimsuit and towels available.
Swimsuits: from JPY 650
Bath towel: JPY 100
Face towel: JPY 50

title: Half Day Hakone Chartered Sightseeing Taxi Tour from Mishima City
description: No matter the season, Hakone boasts wonderful natural beauty along with views of Mt. Fuji. Discover this beloved Japanese region for yourself today.

title: Car Rental Reservation with Multilingual GPS from Miyakojima Airport
description: Explore Miyakojima Island with ease with a convenient rental car. With handy multilingual GPS and 24 hour support, explore the beautiful paradise island at your own pace!

title: Full Day Toyota Plant and Museum Trip from Nagoya
description:
Visit the birthplace of the Toyota Motor Company and see how cars are assembled in the factory. Learn more about the history of automobiles through the special exhibits in the museum.
Take a bus tour around the Toyota Factory with your guide to see how cars are manufactured. Get an up close look at the colorful and massive parts being assembled on conveyor belts by skilled and experienced workers. Enjoy a special interactive experience using new devices within the factory! Walk through the history of automobiles in Japan at the Toyota Commemorative Museum and see the inventions by the Edison of Japan, Sakichi Toyota, founder of the company.

title: Paragliding Flight Adventure in Okazaki
description: Fly through the air on these fun, beginner-friendly paragliding experiences. Choose from tandem or solo flights, or try both! Get a bird's eye view of Aichi's scenery and enjoy the adrenaline rush.

title: Cruise around the Coast on a Fishing Boat in Tanohata
description: Get great views of Iwate's wild and rocky coast, and sail around the dramatic cliffs on this fun cruise in Tanohata. Great for kids and small groups.

title: Private Taxi Tour to Esashi Fujiwara no Sato from Hanamaki
description: See all the best sights of Fujiwara no Sato on this private chartered taxi tour in Iwate! See Mukaiyama Park,Meiji Kinenkan and more. Great for groups.

title: Wooden Horse Folk Craft Painting and Decorating Experience in Morioka
description: Have fun creating your own horse shaped folk toy, locally known as Chagu-Chagu Umakko! Take home a little piece of Morioka's vibrant culture.

title: Tono Sightseeing Course (One Hour Private Taxi Charter)
description:
This short chartered taxi tour will allow you to see all the main sightseeing spots in Tono! Experience the local traditions and explore temples of legend.
Tōno is known throughout Japan as the location of the Tales of Tōno, a compilation of folk tales of the area. This book is now considered one of the greatest studies of Japanese folklore, many of which involve 'kappa', mischievous water sprites said to live in a local pond!

title: Half Day Sightseeing Taxi Tour of World Heritage Sites from Kumamoto City
description: Discover the sites that helped drive Japan's industrialization during the Meiji Era. Visit the Manda Coal Mine or Misumi Harbor, both wonderful examples of building at the time.

title: Cube Candle Workshop for Groups in Otaru
description:
Combine cute cubes and a simple cup to design and create an original candle. This quick activity fits perfectly into a small break and makes for a great souvenir.
This course is only available for a group of 6 or more, and is ideal for school trips or other excursions.

title: Explore Matsushima Area on a Chartered Jumbo Taxi
description: Let your experienced taxi driver take you around the scenic spots of Iwate. Explore the Matsushima area where even the haiku poet, Matsuo Basho fell in love with.

title: Nighttime Cave Snorkeling Adventure in Shakotan
description:
Explore the beautiful Blue Cave at night, and witness the glowing lights of luminescent animals, turning the cave into a star filled outer space.
During daytime, marine blue colored cave. At night, it turns in a dark outer space like area filled with countless stars. Enjoy!

title: Tono 4 Hour Sightseeing Course by Private Taxi Charter
description:
No need to rent a car as you experience the local traditions and explore temples of legend with this chartered taxi tour. Discover all of Tono's rural beauty in one day!
Tono is known throughout Japan as the location of the Tales of Tono, a compilation of folk tales. This book is now considered one of the greatest studies of Japanese folklore, and many of the stories involve 'kappa', mischievous water sprites said to live in a local pond!

title: Make Your Own Glass and Wood Music Box in Otaru
description: Make a revolving music box with wood and round glass. No sharp knives or flames are used, so even children can make their own special souvenir!

title: Full Day Sea Kayaking Lesson for Beginners in Nishi Izu
description: Learn all about the basics of kayaking in the morning then go touring along the Izu coastline, filled with caves, tunnels, and home to a huge variety of fish.

title: Mt. Fuji and Atami Hot Springs Overnight Sightseeing Tour from Tokyo
description: Discover the best of Shizuoka, including wonderful views of Mt. Fuji on a cruise and a rope way. Soak in a hot spring bath and enjoy magnificent ocean views from your hotel room.

title: Hanamaki Private Jumbo Taxi Tour with Wanko Soba Experience
description: Visit all the best sights in beautiful Hanamaki, in Iwate! Enjoy a private taxi charter around the city, then try the local wanko soba, a mix between lunch and a game!

title: Private Tour from Tokyo to Kamakura and the Best Sights in Yokohama
description:
See the lovely ancient capital of Kamakura, then check out the bay area of Yokohama. Enjoy the beautiful skyline of Minato Mirai, temples and more on this guided tour in English, Chinese or French.
This exclusive tour includes private van transport, free wifi and a English and French-speaking trilingual guide. Chinese speaking guides are available on request. The van can fit up to 9 guests, perfect for day trip with friends or family!
You shall be picked up from your requested location within Tokyo's 23 wards to go on a 7 or 9 hour adventure to beautiful, traditional Kamakura and modern Yokohama.

title: Private Tour from Yokohama Port to Kamakura and the Best Sights in Yokohama
description:
Go on a shore excursion to Yokohama if you're travelling by cruise! See the lovely ancient capital of Kamakura, then check out the bay area on this guided charter tour in English, Chinese or French.
This exclusive tour includes private van transport and an English and French-speaking trilingual guide. Chinese speaking guides are available on request. The van can fit up to 9 guests, perfect for traveling with families or friends.

You shall be picked up at Yokohama Port to go on a 7 or 9-hour adventure to beautiful, traditional Kamakura and modern Yokohama.

title: 5 Hour Private Charter Taxi Tour from Abashiri to Shiretoko
description: This private sightseeing taxi tour can take you to and from Memanbetsu Airport. See the best sights of Abashiri and the area nearby, including the Sea of Okhotsk, Shiretoko, Lake Akan and more.

title: Evening Charter Taxi Tour of Hakodate After Sundown
description: See the city of Hakodate glitter with lights after the sun goes down. Hop on a comfortable taxi and head over to the top of Mt. Hakodate to see one of the best night views of the world.

title: Ninja Training School in a Traditional Dojo near Zenkoji Temple in Nagano City
description:
Train with a real ninja master to discover what it takes to become one yourself. Learn all about the history and training of ninja from your English speaking instructor in an active lesson.
Discover the the traditional martial art techniques of the Togakure ninja with your instructor and learn these ancient skills. Great for all ages, the practice will help you learn the culture and history of Japan with a healthy physical and active time!

title: Cruise down the Tenryu River on a Traditional Japanese Boat in Iida
description: Enjoy a relaxing 35 minute cruise down the Tenryu River in Nagano! See Yunose and Minamiharanose, and feel the cool breeze while floating in the traditional Japanese boat.

title: Full Day Chartered Taxi Hot Springs & Sightseeing Tour of Noboribetsu
description: Set out from New Chitose Airport, Sapporo, or Otaru and relax as the driver brings you to famous hot spring resorts like Noboribetsu and the best sightseeing spots.

title: Noboribetsu Natural Hot Springs and Foot Bath Hiking Tour
description: Discover one of Noboribetsu Onsen's hidden spots, the Ooyunuma river, a forest footbath. Soak your feet in the world's only foot bath that flows in a river!

title: Full Day Nagano Tour with Snow Monkey Park Ticket and Sake Tasting
description: Take a scenic walk to visit cute monkeys known to bathe in the hot spring before heading over to the historical Zenkoji Temple. Sample some sake in a local brewery for a memorable time in Nagano.

title: Special Nigiri Sushi and Miso Soup Making Lesson near Nara Station
description: Take this opportunity to learn how to make delicious sushi using the finest ingredients at a school right by Nara Station. Witness the techniques the professionals use at restaurants.

title: Kimono and Yukata Rental and Self-Guided Walk in Shuzenji
description: Choose from 150 styles of Kimono and find your favorite before taking a leisurely stroll around serene Shuzenji. Men and women's styles available!

title: Two Dives in the Izu Area from Tokyo.
description: Try two spots from Toi, Izu Oceanic Park, Osezaki, or Motosu lake. Izu Oceanic Park has various features  and Osezaki is called the Mecca of divers.

title: Private Transfer Service between New Chitose Airport and Niseko Ski Resorts
description:
Get ready for the Hokkaido snow as you go straight from Shin Chitose Airport (CTS) to your hotel in Niseko with this convenient service. Travel hassle-free, even in big groups!
This all-inclusive service makes traveling between Shin Chitose Airport and Niseko a breeze! Highway tolls, parking fees and Meet & Greet fees are all included. From solo travelers to groups of 60, we have you covered!

title: Night Adventure Walk at Jigokudani with Transportation from Noboribetsu
description: Stroll through the otherworldly Jigokudani Valley under the moonlight, carrying only a torch. Watch the skies for the many shooting stars that can be seen in this area.

title: Scenic Tour of the Shirahama Area on a Private Taxi
description: Visit the area with one of the best hot springs of Japan. Tour around the scenic route where many poets and writers gained inspiration from while on a comfortable taxi.

title: Stand-up Paddleboard Experience in Wakayama City
description: Grab a paddle and test your balance on a stand-up paddleboard. Enjoy the view of the sea from above as you watch the colorful sea creatures swim below you.

title: Full Day Sightseeing Taxi Tour of Toyako and Noboribetsu from Otaru or Sapporo
description: Discover the beauty of the area from the Silo Observatory with an excellent view of Toyako or set out for Nakanoshima on a sightseeing boat, and see many wild deer during your taxi tour.

title: Forest Bird Watching Tour in Karuizawa
description: Let our expert outdoor guides teach you about the birds and plants of the forests, and show you the wonderful world of wild creatures in every season.

title: Private Limousine Tour of Hakodate
description:
Go sightseeing in Hakodate in one of the largest limousines in Japan! See secret local spots and enjoy a glass of champagne or wine for a VIP tour.
Feel like a celebrity on this 90 minute limousine tour! See the beautiful Motomachi churches, Kanamori Warehouse, the old Public Hall and gorgeous views of the city and port on this private charter tour of Hakodate.

title: Nature Foot Path Walking Tour in Nemuro
description: Explore the nature trails around Nemuro, and experience the true natural beauty of Hokkaido! Walk by yourself or with a qualified guide, and personalize your adventure. Available all year round!

title: Customized Chartered Jumbo Taxi Tour from Nagano City
description: Consult with your driver in advance and customize your very own trip in Nagano with your group or family. Make new discoveries and go to locations off the beaten path.

title: Chartered Fishing Tour on the Ishigaki Ocean from Ishigaki City
description: Set out for the great deep ocean, and aim for blue marlin! Casting, jigging, and trolling are all available, so you can fish how you like.

title: Ocean Fun and Mangrove Kayaking Full Day Course from Ishigaki
description: From the coast to the jungles, this tour takes you on an intimate and close view of the natural beauty of Ishigaki Island. Get in touch with the tropics!

title: Tropical Dive near Panari Island for Licensed Divers
description: Explore the beauty of the tropical reefs in Okinawa on a dive in the crystal clear waters off Panari Island, where coral reefs and tropical fish abound.

title: Iriomote, Yubujima and Taketomi Triple Island Tour with Multilingual Audio Guide
description:
Cruise through a mangrove forest on Iriomote, then board a water buffalo cart to little Yubujima Island. Discover Taketomi with your choice of glass boat cruise, buffalo cart ride, or a rental bike.
Dive deep into the reaches of Okinawa as you start on untouched Iriomote for a relaxing river cruise through lush mangrove forests. Hop aboard a buffalo drawn cart to cross the shallow waters to Yubujima, just the way it has been done for centuries. Once on Taketomi, choose your way to explore the island! You can set out on your own by bike, see marine life in a glass-bottomed boat or relax and view the traditional village by water buffalo cart. Check out the Kaiji beach's 'star-sand' or the clear waters of Kondoi beach. For lunch, dig in to a traditional Okinawan dish like goya champuru or the popular Yaeyama soba.

title: Jungle Trek and Zip-lining in Ishigakijima
description:
Trek through Ishigakijima's untouched sub-tropical rainforest with your guide, and meet the island's unique wildlife. Then zip-line through the forest!
The chance to zip-line through Ishigaki's lush rainforest is the draw of this half-day tour! The trekking part is not strenuous, so guests without hiking experience can enjoy this eco-tour. Fly over the canopy from 5 different spots, assisted by our experienced guides. Join us on this exciting day in the forest, and see why zip-lining has become all the rage across the world!

This is an ideal tour for days when ocean conditions prevent you from swimming. Thanks to the thick tree coverage, you can take part in this tour even on windy days.

title: Meet Cute Owls at Owl Cafe WATAWATA in Nara
description:
Spend an hour interacting with adorable owls at Nara's first owl cafe, WATAWATA. Among the 14 different types of owls, 1 falcon and 3 parrots, you can meet plenty of feathered friends.

Make your reservation here and skip any language problems for this fun activity in Nara. Just a 10-minute walk from JR Nara station, easily reach the owl cafe and spend a calm hour interacting with the animals.

title: Half or Full Day Diving with English Speaking Guide on Iriomote Island
description: Dive right into the blue oceans filled with colorful tropic reefs. Our English speaking staff are here to help you discover a new world of fun.

title: Private Historical Temple and Shrine Tour of Kamakura from Tokyo
description: Make your way from the busy city of Tokyo to the historical town of Kamakura, once the capital of Japan. Visit the Great Buddha and famous Shinto shrines and travel in style in a private taxi!

title: All Season Bridge Bungy Jump in Sarugakyo
description: Leap out over a calm river among a picture perfect valley. Feel the rush of adrenaline as you soar, then relax on the way back up, with bright water and rugged mountains all around.

title: Beginner Wind Surfing School and Wind Surfing Rental in Miura
description: Miura Beach is famous as a wind surfing spot, enjoying great water and steady breezes. From beginners to experts, conditions are perfect. Lessons for all levels available.

title: Half Day Personal Glass Accessory Making Workshop in Minakami
description: Add patterns or letters on a clear glass board using small bits of colored glass. You can make original accessories or larger pictures to brighten a room or use daily.

title: Fun Gel Candle Half Day Workshop in Minakami
description: Mix brightly colored sand and cute little ornaments and make a freeze frame picture inside a gel candle. You might make it too cute to ever use!

title: Blue Moon Hill Farm: Learn the basics of horse riding and go into the forest
description:
You can learn the basics of horse back riding in the lush forests of Minakami. Enjoy the fresh air and the time with our friendly horses!
Appropriate for total beginners, this lesson will help you enjoy horse back riding confidently and experience the healing power of nature and horses.

title: Half Day Bus Tour of Nara's Top Three World Heritage Sites
description: This easy morning tour will take you to Nara's most famous World Heritage Sites, including Todaiji Temple, Kasuga Taisha Shrine, and Koufukuji Temple. You can even meet the city's cute deer!

title: Full Day Asukaji Temple and Ancient Ruins Sightseeing Taxi Tour from Nara
description: Visit spots of ancient history including Asuka Historical Museum, Asukadera Temple, and the Ishibutai Tumulus, a barrow from the 6th or 7th century.

title: Early Morning Nara Park and Historical Temple Sightseeing Taxi Tour in Nara
description: Beat the crowds with a smooth early morning taxi to gorgeous Nara Park, home to 1,200 Japanese deer, living national monuments of Japan, then see temples in the historic city.

title: Special Vegetarian Lunch with Fresh Local Ingredients at Zenkoji in Nagano
description: Savor a Shojin Ryori style vegetarian lunch made from fresh local ingredients in a private room. Enjoy traditional food culture and the quiet atmosphere of the temple.

title: Half Day Clear Candle Making Lesson in Karuizawa
description: Jump in and make a gel candle with an easy lesson. Just choose your favorite items, arrange them how you like, then add the gel. Voila! You have a unique candle to take home.

title: Custom Private Sightseeing Taxi in Lake Suwa
description: Tour around Lake Suwa to feel the history and culture. Create your own courses and visit tourist spots, museums, breweries and many more.  Let your local driver assist you to your location.

title: Professional Sports and Relaxation Massage Treatments in Niseko
description: Visit us to soothe your tired muscles and revitalize your body and mind. Our highly qualified and experienced massage therapists will tune your body and prepare you for your next day on the mountain!

title: Hand Forming and Pottery Wheel Experience in Hokkaido
description:
Ceramic art beginners welcome! Try electric potter's wheel! Please participate at ease as our staff kindly helps you at making even a difficult ceramic art work on the electric potter's wheel.
At Craft & Gallery Dream you can see the works of Tomitsugu and Hiroko Ikeda, potters in Muroran. Come learn how to shape and mold the clay to create your own pottery, and see why it is considered such a relaxing activity!

title: Half Day Kaleidoscope Making Workshop in Shimoda
description: Make an original karedoscope and discover the beauty of the world with colorful glass and tiny mirrors, all done by you. Perfect as a souvenir or gift.

title: Half and Full Day Canoe & Jungle Waterfall Trek Tours on Iriomote Island
description: Set out through the mangroves and make your way to the towering Pinaisara falls or the scenic Sangara waterfall on fun outdoor adventures.

title: Mangrove Canoeing and Tropical Canyoning Adventure from Taketomi
description: Make your way to a waterfall by canoeing through mangroves and trekking in the jungle, then feel the excitement of canyoning in the tropics.

title: Child-Friendly Mangrove Canoe and Waterfall Adventure in Taketomi
description: Observe animals and plants native to the subtropical zone, row a canoe, and jump into natural pools on this kid focused family tour in tropical Okinawa.

title: Ishigaki and Taketomi Full-Day Island Tour with Multilingual Audio Guide
description:
See the sights of Ishigaki and Taketomi in one day! From Kabira Bay to Taketomi's water buffalo carts, experience the best of the Yaeyama islands.
From the turquoise Kabira Bay (with optional glass-bottom boat tour) to the Tamatori Viewpoint, enjoy Ishigaki's beautiful natural sights. In the afternoon visit Taketomi Island, taking in the red-roofed Ryukyu village from one of the famous water buffalo carts. Lunch at Aunt Pozu's restaurant is included. This hassle-free tour makes exploring the islands easy!

Children under the age of 5 ride free, when accompanied by at least one adult.

title: Half and Full Day Coral Reef Snorkeling Adventure Tours on Iriomote Island
description: Dip into the warm tropical waters of Iriomote Island for exciting snorkeling with expansive reefs, bright fish, and maybe even a sea turtle spotting.

title: Group Farming Experience in Biei
description:
Try a professional farm experience and learn how to take care of animals. From milking cows to shearing sheep, you can learn just how humans and animal live together.
A restaurant on the farm also offers dishes with local beef. We also have a room that can accommodate up to 120 people. We also serve lunch for groups. so feel free to contact us.

title: Simple Tokoname Ceramics Workshop in Tokoname City
description: Drop in for a beginner and all ages friendly ceramics making lesson at the Tokoname Pottery Ceramall. After making a unique creation, you can relax at the cafe.

title: Half Day Murouji and Hasedera Temples Sightseeing Taxi Tour from Nara
description: Step into history with visits to ancient temples including the storied Hasedera Temple. See the Mirokumagaibutsu, a Buddha sculpted into natural rock, a marvel of work.

title: Half Day Bus Tour of Kamakura's Best Sights
description: See all the top sights in the ancient capital of Kamakura on this convenient tour! See the serene Great Buddha,Hasedera and Kenchoji Temple, Tsurugaokahachimangu Shrine and more! Lunch plan available!

title: Cake Candle Making Workshop in Otaru
description: Make a real looking mini cake that is actually a candle! From the base to the whipped cream and fruit, it looks just like a small treat. You can add a message and use it as a gift too.

title: Otaru Sea Coast Cruise and Blue Cave
description: Visit a rare Blue Cave where the waves and sun create a unique combination of scenery and enjoy a fun cruise around the Otaru sea cliffs and coast.

title: Eclectic Evening Food Tour in the Dotonbori Area of Osaka
description:
Enjoy Osaka's food at several spots off the beaten path. Your guide will take you through Dotonbori for food stops at a Michelin Rated Takoyaki place, hidden Izakayas, a unique bar hub and more!
This evening food tour in Osaka is unlike any other with its eclectic selection of locations. From bustling Dotonbori through hidden alleyways, you will get to see a side of Osaka that is rare for visitors. Enjoy an array of tasty Osaka dishes and experience the fun personalities of the locals. Munch on local treats at top rated food stops, visit hidden Izakayas and explore the quirky side of Osaka's bar scene all in one night.

title: Osaka Hop-On Hop-Off Sightseeing Bus Tickets and Cruise Ticket
description:
Ride on the 2-story Osaka Wonderloop bus and explore the city. Board the bus at any of its 13 stops in Osaka and you'll have a panoramic view of the city from the open 2nd floor! 
This convenient bus will help you to avoid any confusing train stations and expensive train fare. You'll be able to easily navigate the city on this bus with the help of the free guidebook included in your ticket. You can also use free wifi on the bus while you enjoy all the best sightseeing and shopping spots in Osaka. Exchange your Veltra voucher on the bus or at the various desks around the city!

title: Two Days in Osaka Tour with Hotel and Bullet Train Tickets from Tokyo
description: This bargain travel package to Osaka includes shinkansen tickets and accommodations in Osaka, letting you create your own tour and explore the bustling city.

title: Kyoto Morning, Afternoon or Full Day Tour from Osaka
description:
Explore the ancient city of Kyoto with expert guides! See all of Kyoto's sights with a full day sightseeing extravaganza, morning or afternoon tour.
Full Day and Morning Tours begin at Kyoto's famous Nijo Castle, where the last Edo Shogun restored authority to Japan's Imperial Court. Move on to golden Kinkakuji Temple, before a visit to the Kyoto Imperial Palace or Kitano Tenmangu Shrine.

The Full Day adventure continues and the Afternoon Tour begins at the stunning Heian Shrine, a commemoration to the 1,100th anniversary of the founding of Kyoto. Next, head to the halls of Sanjusangendo with its impressive 1,000 life-sized Kannon statues. Kiyomizudera Temple is your final destination, a historic gem with stunning vistas of Kyoto.

title: Aroma Oil Massage Plans for Relaxation on Ishigaki Island
description: Completely relax on tropical Ishigaki Island as you treat yourself to an aroma oil massage. Soothe sore muscles and feel stress just fade away.

title: Full-Day Car Rental with Airport Transfers in Ishigaki Island
description:
Venture around the beautiful Ishigaki Island on a comfortable car of your choice. With a built-in GPS, you can navigate your way throughout the island at ease.
This car rental agent has the following insurance or compensations to cover the damages or responsibilities of the accidents. However, if it goes over the covered amount, the extra charges will be held by the customer.

The following insurance compensation system is included in the charge:
Interpersonal (per person): Unlimited
Belongings and vehicle (per accident): Unlimited (immunity from responsibility JPY 50,000)
Personal injury compensation in case of death: JPY 30 million per person (to the maximum amount of passengers)

title: Panari Island Sightseeing and Free Time or Snorkeling for All Ages
description: Take the family out and jump into the crystal blue waters off Panari Island. Sandy beaches, clear water, forests and fun are waiting for everyone 3 and up!

title: Half-Day Bus Tour of Ishigaki Island (Morning/Afternoon)
description:
See all the major sights of Ishigakijima on this easy half-day tour. Check out Kabira Bay and Tamatorizaki Viewpoint, and listen to island songs!
Choose between a convenient morning or afternoon tour of Ishigakijima, visiting sights like the turquoise Kabira Bay, the dragon-festooned Toujin Grave and the lush Yaeyamayashi palm tree forest. On the morning tour stop for lunch overlooking the ocean, and sample Yaeyama-style cuisine.

Ideal for guests who cannot drive, this is a hassle-free way to tour Ishigaki. The bus guides sing traditional Okinawan songs.

As the morning tour stops at the airport, this is a great way to see more of Ishigaki before your flight!

title: Half-Day Iriomote and Yubujima Island Adventure from Ishigaki Island
description: From mangroves to water buffaloes, see all the best of wild Iriomote and Yubujima Island on this half-day tour from Ishigaki. Experience the beauty of the Yaeyama Islands!

title: Half Day Traditional Stained Glass Accessory Making Workshop in Minakami
description: Connect bright bits of colored glass with solder and make your choice of key chain, mirror, lamp or photo frame. Take your work home with you as a lovely souvenir.

title: Okonomiyaki Cooking Class with Kimono Rental in Osaka
description:
Learn how to make one of Japan's most popular dish, okonomiyaki! Cook up a storm in a traditional Japanese kitchen while wearing a Kimono for a truly memorable experience.
Please note that during hot summer days, you will be wearing a yukata (light cotton kimono) instead of a full kimono.

title: Day Cruise Sightseeing Around the Port of Osaka on the Santa Maria
description:
Take a day cruise and see the best sights in the Osaka bay area. Starting at Tempozan Harbor Village Osaka Aquarium, enjoy the Port of Osaka's scenery aboard the Columbus-inspired Santa Maria.
Go sightseeing around the Port of Osaka with this day cruise. The Santa Maria cruise ship's design is inspired by one of the ships used by Christopher Columbus on his way to the new world. This cruise ship has been constructed to around twice the scale of the original Santa Maria. Starting with the Osaka bay area's many famous locations, enjoy the beautiful scenery from the water.

title: Maid Cafe Live Shows and Performances in Osaka
description:
Watch a series of fun, full-scale performances for a kawaii experience at a maid cafe in Osaka. Enjoy an all-you-can-drink course or go for the food and photo course for an extra memorable time!
Enjoy Osaka and kawaii culture by spending some time at one of Osaka's maid cafes. The friendly maids will show off their different talents with super cute performances of songs, dances and even some magic tricks.
While you watch you can choose the 1-hour all-you-can-drink course for refreshment, or instead choose the plan with a drink, a cute omelette and a Polaroid photo to take back with you as a souvenir.

title: Short English Guided Tour of Shirataniunsuikou or Yakusugi Land
description: Perfect for a half day before you leave the island. Join your guide for a quick tour of Shirataniunsuikyou or see the cedars of Yakusugi Land!

title: Trekking the Mountains of Yakushima Island
description: Select from various mountains on Yakushima island to trek up. Every mountain has something differ to offer you. Witness the panoramic scenery from above for you to remember.

title: Tachudake Peak Full Day Private Hiking Tour in Yakushima (Transfers Included)
description:
Aim for the 1,497 meter high summit of Tachudake Peak, and look out over the forest with this privately guided tour to one of Yakushima's hidden gems!
With your very own private guide, you don't have to worry about missing anything in the forests of Yakushima. Travelling in a large group can be stressful or make it hard to hear, but with a small group of friends and a guide, you can learn all about the area, flora, and fauna while hiking at the pace that suits you best!

Enjoy hiking up a local peak, and avoiding the crowds in the main forest area while still viewing massive and ancient trees, along with boulders and panoramic vistas.

title: Private Aroma Spa and Massage Treatments in Yakushima
description:
After trekking through the vast nature of Yakushima Island, treat yourself to an aromatic treatment in a private spa near Miyanoura. Revitalize your soul (and soles!) with the soothing fragrances.
Listen to the gentle flow of the river and bask in the warm sunlight peering from the leaves. Become one with the forest of Yakushima Island as you relax in the comforting scents of the woods. Feel your muscles relax as you enjoy a luxurious aroma treatment in a quiet spa surrounded by the woods.

title: Two-Day Overnight Camping Experience in the Cedar Forest of Yakushima
description: Hike through the trails of Yakushima leading you into a mystical forest with ancient cedars. Spend a night within the mountain for an unforgettable wildlife experience.

title: Introductory Cultural Shodo Calligraphy Lesson in Namba or Shinsaibashi
description: Get an introduction to writing with brush and ink in a calligraphy class located in Osaka. Learn the basics from a helpful teacher and hang your finished piece on a scroll to take home.

title: English Language Tour to Osaka's Top Sights around Umeda
description: Visit the Floating Garden, stroll though the traditional houses of Nakazakicho, then look for cool souvenirs and treats at Tenjinbashisuji Arcade. Finish the tour at the Osaka House and Living Museum.

title: Yukata Dressing Lesson for Men and Women in Osaka (with Yukata to Take Home)
description: Learn the traditional way to dress yourself in a fashionable cotton summer kimono. After your lesson with your English-speaking teacher, take the yukata set home as a souvenir of your visit to Japan!

title: Osaka Naniwa Discovery River Cruise with Rakugo Guide
description:
See a different side of Osaka on a fun river cruise. Float by Dotombori, Nakanoshima, Osaka Public Hall and many of the city's dramatic water gates with funny pro Rakugo comedian guides.
Relax in the comfortable cruise boat, and see Osaka's best sights from the water! The waterways were the life blood of this prosperous merchant city, and there is no better way to get a feel for Osaka then by traveling along them.
